66ee68e650387dd300fcc6ab0b14a1c66eb6dc58.body: Mamoru Tasaka discovered that filenames of the image archives are not properly sanitized before being passed to decompression utilities like unrar and unzip, which use the system() libc library call.. subTitle: Insecure filename usage in cbrPager may allow for the remote execution of arbitrary code.. background: cbrPager is a comic book pager.. extra: A remote attacker could entice a user to open an archive with a specially crafted filename, resulting in arbitrary code execution with the privileges of the user running the application.

9a5a53bc13895824184590dc74e078b36abfcd80.title: Motion: Execution of arbitrary code — GLSA 200807-02
9a5a53bc13895824184590dc74e078b36abfcd80.body: Nico Golde reported an off-by-one error within the read_client() function in the webhttpd.c file, leading to a stack-based buffer overflow. Stefan Cornelius (Secunia Research) reported a boundary error within the same function, also leading to a stack-based buffer overflow. Both vulnerabilities require that the HTTP Control interface is enabled.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities in Motion might result in the execution of arbitrary code.. background: Motion is a program that monitors the video signal from one or more cameras and is able to detect motions.. extra: A remote attacker could exploit these vulnerabilities by sending an overly long or specially crafted request to a vulnerable Motion HTTP control interface, possibly resulting in the execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the motion user.

2ccd89294255eff50306d501f7e0ca8d11570907.title: Courier Authentication Library: SQL injection vulnerability — GLSA 200809-05
2ccd89294255eff50306d501f7e0ca8d11570907.body: It has been discovered that some input (e.g. the username) passed to the library are not properly sanitised before being used in SQL queries.. subTitle: An SQL injection vulnerability has been discovered in the Courier Authentication Library.. background: The Courier Authentication Library is a generic authentication API that encapsulates the process of validating account passwords.. extra: A remote attacker could provide specially crafted input to the library, possibly resulting in the remote execution of arbitrary SQL commands. NOTE: Exploitation of this vulnerability requires that a MySQL database is used for authentication and that a Non-Latin character set is selected.

3a8f95d1e4fc81e8496f817c071a496bfd470678.title: ClamAV: Multiple Denials of Service — GLSA 200808-07
3a8f95d1e4fc81e8496f817c071a496bfd470678.body: Damian Put has discovered an out-of-bounds memory access while processing Petite files (CVE-2008-2713, CVE-2008-3215). Also, please note that the 0.93 ClamAV branch fixes the first of the two attack vectors of CVE-2007-6595 concerning an insecure creation of temporary files vulnerability. The sigtool attack vector seems still unfixed.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities in ClamAV may result in a Denial of Service.. background: Clam AntiVirus is a free anti-virus toolkit for UNIX, designed especially for e-mail scanning on mail gateways.. extra: A remote attacker could entice a user or automated system to scan a specially crafted Petite file, possibly resulting in a Denial of Service (daemon crash). Also, the insecure creation of temporary files vulnerability can be triggered by a local user to perform a symlink attack.

6bdd7821b9fc3b766c585d08245f150e0aaa150c.title: TMSNC: Execution of arbitrary code — GLSA 200903-26
6bdd7821b9fc3b766c585d08245f150e0aaa150c.body: Nico Golde reported a stack-based buffer overflow when processing a MSN packet with a UBX command containing a large UBX payload length field.. subTitle: A buffer overflow in TMSNC might lead to the execution of arbitrary code when processing an instant message.. background: TMSNC is a Textbased client for the MSN instant messaging protocol.. extra: A remote attacker could send a specially crafted message, possibly resulting in the execution of arbitrary code.

ca49c0cf3f797753799dcff034c6fb453561bddb.title: libxslt: Execution of arbitrary code — GLSA 200808-06
ca49c0cf3f797753799dcff034c6fb453561bddb.body: Chris Evans (Google Security) reported that the libexslt library that is part of libxslt is affected by a heap-based buffer overflow in the RC4 encryption/decryption functions.. subTitle: libxslt is affected by a heap-based buffer overflow, possibly leading to the execution of arbitrary code.. background: libxslt is the XSLT C library developed for the GNOME project. XSLT is an XML language to define transformations for XML.. extra: A remote attacker could entice a user to process an XML file using a specially crafted XSLT stylesheet in an application linked against libxslt, possibly leading to the execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running the application.

efdb424996f602b2a61946c8bf23fb97d92d537a.title: Postfix: Local privilege escalation vulnerability — GLSA 200808-12
efdb424996f602b2a61946c8bf23fb97d92d537a.body: Sebastian Krahmer of SuSE has found that Postfix allows to deliver mail to root-owned symlinks in an insecure manner under certain conditions. Normally, Postfix does not deliver mail to symlinks, except to root-owned symlinks, for compatibility with the systems using symlinks in /dev like Solaris. Furthermore, some systems like Linux allow to hardlink a symlink, while the POSIX.1-2001 standard requires that the symlink is followed. Depending on the write permissions and the delivery agent being used, this can lead to an arbitrary local file overwriting vulnerability (CVE-2008-2936). Furthermore, the Postfix delivery agent does not properly verify the ownership of a mailbox before delivering mail (CVE-2008-2937).. subTitle: Postfix incorrectly checks the ownership of a mailbox, allowing, in certain circumstances, to append data to arbitrary files on a local system with root privileges.. background: Postfix is Wietse Venema's mailer that attempts to be fast, easy to administer, and secure, as an alternative to the widely-used Sendmail program.. extra: The combination of these features allows a local attacker to hardlink a root-owned symlink such that the newly created symlink would be root-owned and would point to a regular file (or another symlink) that would be written by the Postfix built-in local(8) or virtual(8) delivery agents, regardless the ownership of the final destination regular file. Depending on the write permissions of the spool mail directory, the delivery style, and the existence of a root mailbox, this could allow a local attacker to append a mail to an arbitrary file like /etc/passwd in order to gain root privileges.

83c23902336d660728e3161ffa679962a32e7383.title: Mercurial: Directory traversal — GLSA 200807-09
83c23902336d660728e3161ffa679962a32e7383.body: Jakub Wilk discovered a directory traversal vulnerabilty in the applydiff() function in the mercurial/patch.py file.. subTitle: A directory traversal vulnerability in Mercurial allows for the renaming of arbitrary files.. background: Mercurial is a distributed Source Control Management system.. extra: A remote attacker could entice a user to import a specially crafted patch, possibly resulting in the renaming of arbitrary files, even outside the repository.

3785305047f9db01c696a8708c2d8c7ce62934f4.title: Poppler: User-assisted execution of arbitrary code — GLSA 200807-04
3785305047f9db01c696a8708c2d8c7ce62934f4.body: Felipe Andres Manzano reported a memory management issue in the Page class constructor/destructor.. subTitle: Poppler is affected by a memory management issue, which could lead to the execution of arbitrary code.. background: Poppler is a cross-platform PDF rendering library originally based on Xpdf.. extra: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted PDF file with a Poppler-based PDF viewer such as Gentoo's Xpdf, Epdfview, or Evince, potentially resulting in the execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running the application.

7a6a0f9c75af92c052878c925ec80bde7be00e7d.title: OpenLDAP: Denial of Service vulnerability — GLSA 200808-09
7a6a0f9c75af92c052878c925ec80bde7be00e7d.body: Cameron Hotchkies discovered an error within the parsing of ASN.1 BER encoded packets in the "ber_get_next()" function in libraries/liblber/io.c.. subTitle: A flaw in OpenLDAP allows remote unauthenticated attackers to cause a Denial of Service.. background: OpenLDAP Software is an open source implementation of the Lightweight Directory Access Protocol.. extra: A remote unauthenticated attacker can send a specially crafted ASN.1 BER encoded packet which will trigger the error and cause an "assert()", terminating the "slapd" daemon.

6504cafef7e052e321d217815de0b8296c80bf88.title: Wireshark: Denial of service — GLSA 200808-04
6504cafef7e052e321d217815de0b8296c80bf88.body: Multiple vulnerabilities related to memory management were discovered in the GSM SMS dissector (CVE-2008-3137), the PANA and KISMET dissectors (CVE-2008-3138), the RTMPT dissector (CVE-2008-3139), the syslog dissector (CVE-2008-3140) and the RMI dissector (CVE-2008-3141) and when reassembling fragmented packets (CVE-2008-3145).. subTitle: Multiple Denial of Service vulnerabilities have been discovered in Wireshark.. background: Wireshark is a network protocol analyzer with a graphical front-end.. extra: A remote attacker could exploit these vulnerabilities by sending a specially crafted packet on a network being monitored by Wireshark or enticing a user to read a malformed packet trace file, causing a Denial of Service.

a1e41c7074458552096da499f740b3e614a48a42.title: Wireshark: Multiple Denials of Service — GLSA 200809-17
a1e41c7074458552096da499f740b3e614a48a42.body: The following vulnerabilities were reported:. subTitle: Multiple Denial of Service vulnerabilities have been discovered in Wireshark.. background: Wireshark is a network protocol analyzer with a graphical front-end.. extra: A remote attacker could exploit these vulnerabilities by sending specially crafted packets on a network being monitored by Wireshark or by enticing a user to read a malformed packet trace file, causing a Denial of Service.

ec62258fa6d2620eae5ae734dfb7cef553189e28.title: FFmpeg: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 200903-33
ec62258fa6d2620eae5ae734dfb7cef553189e28.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were found in FFmpeg:. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities in FFmpeg may lead to the remote execution of arbitrary code or a Denial of Service.. background: FFmpeg is a complete solution to record, convert and stream audio and video. gst-plugins-ffmpeg is a FFmpeg based gstreamer plugin which includes a vulnerable copy of FFmpeg code. Mplayer is a multimedia player which also includes a vulnerable copy of the code.. extra: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted media file, possibly leading to the execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running the application, or a Denial of Service.

39c5dd7a4775c2643fb8186cf64c73fa53c1f3e0.title: libxml2: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 200812-06
39c5dd7a4775c2643fb8186cf64c73fa53c1f3e0.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in libxml2:. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities in libxml2 might lead to execution of arbitrary code or Denial of Service.. background: libxml2 is the XML (eXtended Markup Language) C parser and toolkit initially developed for the Gnome project.. extra: A remote attacker could entice a user or automated system to open a specially crafted XML document with an application using libxml2, possibly resulting in the exeution of arbitrary code or a high CPU and memory consumption.

269c23c3b1fc65edfc0f3eeecf12c64e7bdec906.title: PowerDNS: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 200812-19
269c23c3b1fc65edfc0f3eeecf12c64e7bdec906.body: Daniel Drown reported an error when receiving a HINFO CH query (CVE-2008-5277). Brian J. Dowling of Simplicity Communications discovered a previously unknown security implication of the PowerDNS behavior to not respond to certain queries it considers malformed (CVE-2008-3337).. subTitle: Two vulnerabilities have been discovered in PowerDNS, possibly leading to a Denial of Service and easing cache poisoning attacks.. background: The PowerDNS Nameserver is an authoritative-only nameserver which uses a flexible backend architecture.. extra: A remote attacker could send specially crafted queries to cause a Denial of Service. The second vulnerability in itself does not pose a security risk to PowerDNS Nameserver. However, not answering a query for an invalid DNS record within a valid domain allows for a larger spoofing window on third-party nameservers for domains being hosted by PowerDNS Nameserver itself.

4f058b1337286211e58eb07a84fad2af2fddef5a.title: JasPer: User-assisted execution of arbitrary code — GLSA 200812-18
4f058b1337286211e58eb07a84fad2af2fddef5a.body: Marc Espie and Christian Weisgerber have discovered multiple vulnerabilities in JasPer:. subTitle: Multiple memory management errors in JasPer might lead to execution of arbitrary code via jpeg2k files.. background: The JasPer Project is an open-source initiative to provide a free software-based reference implementation of the codec specified in the JPEG-2000 Part-1 (jpeg2k) standard.. extra: Remote attackers could entice a user or automated system to process specially crafted jpeg2k files with an application using JasPer, possibly leading to the execution of arbitrary code.

2337626b8044d09ef85cd0af3a4169d8288a4514.title: Git: User-assisted execution of arbitrary code — GLSA 200809-16
2337626b8044d09ef85cd0af3a4169d8288a4514.body: Multiple boundary errors in the functions diff_addremove() and diff_change() when processing overly long repository path names were reported.. subTitle: Multiple buffer overflow vulnerabilities have been discovered in Git.. background: Git is a distributed version control system.. extra: A remote attacker could entice a user to run commands like "git-diff" or "git-grep" on a specially crafted repository, possibly resulting in the remote execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running the application.

bdb39ce64e051eb2fddece86326a9814ae580f71.title: OpenTTD: Execution of arbitrary code — GLSA 200903-09
bdb39ce64e051eb2fddece86326a9814ae580f71.body: Multiple buffer overflows have been reported in OpenTTD, when storing long for client names (CVE-2008-3547), in the TruncateString function in src/gfx.cpp (CVE-2008-3576) and in src/openttd.cpp when processing a large filename supplied to the "-g" parameter in the ttd_main function (CVE-2008-3577).. subTitle: Multiple buffer overflows in OpenTTD might allow for the execution of arbitrary code in the server.. background: OpenTTD is a clone of Transport Tycoon Deluxe.. extra: An authenticated attacker could exploit these vulnerabilities to execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the OpenTTD server.

28cabc6cfd6507be383db7c6a65ea37a70493308.title: Gallery: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 200811-02
28cabc6cfd6507be383db7c6a65ea37a70493308.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Gallery 1 and 2:. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities in Gallery may lead to execution of arbitrary code, disclosure of local files or theft of user's credentials.. background: Gallery is an open source web based photo album organizer.. extra: Remote attackers could send specially crafted requests to a server running Gallery, allowing for the execution of arbitrary code when register_globals is enabled, or read arbitrary files via directory traversals otherwise. Attackers could also entice users to visit crafted links allowing for theft of login credentials.

e2d56c2455a9de947a7e640aef730d806472dbea.title: IPsec-Tools: racoon Denial of service — GLSA 200812-03
e2d56c2455a9de947a7e640aef730d806472dbea.body: Two Denial of Service vulnerabilities have been reported in racoon:. subTitle: IPsec-Tools' racoon is affected by a remote Denial of Service vulnerability.. background: IPsec-Tools is a port of KAME's implementation of the IPsec utilities. It contains a collection of network monitoring tools, including racoon, ping, and ping6.. extra: An attacker could exploit these vulnerabilities to cause a Denial of Service.

cf0bf89f14f4aa405ff8a40094115c8eb1e6f2db.title: Ventrilo: Denial of service — GLSA 200904-13
cf0bf89f14f4aa405ff8a40094115c8eb1e6f2db.body: Luigi Auriemma reported a NULL pointer dereference in Ventrilo when processing packets with an invalid version number followed by another packet.. subTitle: A vulnerability has been discovered in Ventrilo, allowing for a Denial of Service.. background: Ventrilo is a Voice over IP group communication server.. extra: A remote attacker could send specially crafted packets to the server, resulting in a crash.

93e5c732b434c2dba2f8e1d1a01f374ac18af2af.title: VLC: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 200809-06
93e5c732b434c2dba2f8e1d1a01f374ac18af2af.body: g_ reported the following vulnerabilities:. subTitle: Two vulnerabilities in VLC may lead to the remote execution of arbitrary code.. background: VLC is a cross-platform media player and streaming server.. extra: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted file, possibly resulting in the remote execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running the application.

a6eb9e3f9bd8f26fcca9a8066423cd0511a4d568.title: enscript: User-assisted execution of arbitrary code — GLSA 200812-02
a6eb9e3f9bd8f26fcca9a8066423cd0511a4d568.body: Two stack-based buffer overflows in the read_special_escape() function in src/psgen.c have been reported. Ulf Harnhammar of Secunia Research discovered a vulnerability related to the "setfilename" command (CVE-2008-3863), and Kees Cook of Ubuntu discovered a vulnerability related to the "font" escape sequence (CVE-2008-4306).. subTitle: Two buffer overflows in enscript might lead to the execution of arbitrary code.. background: enscript is a powerful ASCII to PostScript file converter.. extra: An attacker could entice a user or automated system to process specially crafted input with the special escapes processing enabled using the "-e" option, possibly resulting in the execution of arbitrary code.

2d2c50ffc425cd9548fc8f85b70889b746712028.title: Postfix: Denial of service — GLSA 200809-09
2d2c50ffc425cd9548fc8f85b70889b746712028.body: It has been discovered than Postfix leaks an epoll file descriptor when executing external commands, e.g. user-controlled $HOME/.forward or $HOME/.procmailrc files. NOTE: This vulnerability only concerns Postfix instances running on Linux 2.6 kernels.. subTitle: A memory leak in Postfix might allow local users to cause a Denial of Service.. background: Postfix is Wietse Venema's mailer that attempts to be fast, easy to administer, and secure, as an alternative to the widely-used Sendmail program.. extra: A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to reduce the performance of Postfix, and possibly trigger an assertion, resulting in a Denial of Service.

44de76cee6165576a0aea35cd1ebfb98df555d45.title: Newsbeuter: User-assisted execution of arbitrary code — GLSA 200809-12
44de76cee6165576a0aea35cd1ebfb98df555d45.body: J.H.M. Dassen reported that the open-in-browser command does not properly escape shell metacharacters in the URL before passing it to system().. subTitle: Insufficient input validation in newsbeuter may allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary shell commands.. background: Newsbeuter is a RSS/Atom feed reader for the text console.. extra: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a feed with specially crafted URLs, possibly resulting in the remote execution of arbitrary shell commands with the privileges of the user running the application.

4bdc730e79dd82c28c56e827532ddbb5fd466edb.title: GNU ed: User-assisted execution of arbitrary code — GLSA 200809-15
4bdc730e79dd82c28c56e827532ddbb5fd466edb.body: Alfredo Ortega from Core Security Technologies reported a heap-based buffer overflow in the strip_escapes() function when processing overly long filenames.. subTitle: A buffer overflow vulnerability in ed may allow for the remote execution of arbitrary code.. background: GNU ed is a basic line editor. red is a restricted version of ed that does not allow shell command execution.. extra: A remote attacker could entice a user to process specially crafted commands with ed or red, possibly resulting in the execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running the application.

48c5559aae6bf8eb17624612261bd3971a19b75c.title: BitlBee: Security bypass — GLSA 200809-14
48c5559aae6bf8eb17624612261bd3971a19b75c.body: Multiple unspecified vulnerabilities were reported, including a NULL pointer dereference.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities in Bitlbee may allow to bypass security restrictions and hijack accounts.. background: BitlBee is an IRC to IM gateway that support multiple IM protocols.. extra: A remote attacker could exploit these vulnerabilities to overwrite existing IM accounts.

8e52e32322c6c06208e18ea40423388d81185886.title: GNU Emacs, XEmacs: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 200902-06
8e52e32322c6c06208e18ea40423388d81185886.body: Morten Welinder reports about GNU Emacs and edit-utils in XEmacs: By shipping a .flc accompanying a source file (.c for example) and setting font-lock-support-mode to fast-lock-mode in the source file through local variables, any Lisp code in the .flc file is executed without warning (CVE-2008-2142).. subTitle: Two vulnerabilities were found in GNU Emacs, possibly leading to user-assisted execution of arbitrary code. One also affects edit-utils in XEmacs.. background: GNU Emacs and XEmacs are highly extensible and customizable text editors. edit-utils are miscellaneous extensions to XEmacs.. extra: Romain Francoise reported a security risk in a feature of GNU Emacs related to interacting with Python. The vulnerability arises because Python, by default, prepends the current directory to the module search path, allowing for arbitrary code execution when launched from a specially crafted directory (CVE-2008-3949).

1a204ec787cc058aa912a9f096dc37650072b513.title: phpMyAdmin: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 200903-32
1a204ec787cc058aa912a9f096dc37650072b513.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been reported in phpMyAdmin:. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in phpMyAdmin, the worst of which may allow for remote code execution.. background: phpMyAdmin is a web-based management tool for MySQL databases.. extra: A remote attacker may execute arbitrary code with the rights of the webserver, inject and execute SQL with the rights of phpMyAdmin or conduct XSS attacks against other users.

5d135af86aaf63232e1f8205a6ba6a3731e04a14.title: Opera: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 200811-01
5d135af86aaf63232e1f8205a6ba6a3731e04a14.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Opera:. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Opera, allowing for the execution of arbitrary code.. background: Opera is a fast web browser that is available free of charge.. extra: These vulnerabilties allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code, to run scripts injected into Opera's History Search with elevated privileges, to inject arbitrary web script or HTML into web pages, to manipulate the address bar, to change Opera's preferences, to determine the validity of local filenames, to read cache files, browsing history, and subscribed feeds or to conduct other attacks.

cc0018b1b9ad48db22ca0e20c51212f201f666c4.title: FAAD2: User-assisted execution of arbitrary code — GLSA 200811-03
cc0018b1b9ad48db22ca0e20c51212f201f666c4.body: The ICST-ERCIS (Peking University) reported a heap-based buffer overflow in the decodeMP4file() function in frontend/main.c.. subTitle: A buffer overflow in FAAD2 might lead to user-assisted execution of arbitrary code via an MP4 file.. background: FAAD2 is an open source MPEG-4 and MPEG-2 AAC decoder.. extra: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted MPEG-4 (MP4) file in an application using FAAD2, possibly leading to the execution of arbitrary code.

71f4d5759e9a9226715e31a8d1975a038169bbc1.title: lighttpd: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 200812-04
71f4d5759e9a9226715e31a8d1975a038169bbc1.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been reported in lighttpd:. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities in lighttpd may lead to information disclosure or a Denial of Service.. background: lighttpd is a lightweight high-performance web server.. extra: A remote attacker could exploit these vulnerabilities to cause a Denial of Service, to bypass intended access restrictions, to obtain sensitive information, or to possibly modify data.

5e45839aee9db17701c9eae6ffa36d8a5fcea9c5.title: phpCollab: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 200812-20
5e45839aee9db17701c9eae6ffa36d8a5fcea9c5.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in phpCollab:. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in phpCollab allowing for remote injection of shell commands, PHP code and SQL statements.. background: phpCollab is a web-enabled groupware and project management software written in PHP. It uses SQL-based database backends.. extra: These vulnerabilities enable remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL statements and PHP code. NOTE: Some of the SQL injection vulnerabilities require the php.ini option "magic_quotes_gpc" to be disabled. Furthermore, an attacker might be able to execute arbitrary shell commands if "register_globals" is enabled, "magic_quotes_gpc" is disabled, the PHP OpenSSL extension is not installed or loaded and the file "installation/setup.php" has not been deleted after installation.

85212c8afabae12f34664a86dc41ea288b7ca817.title: Net-SNMP: Denial of service — GLSA 200901-15
85212c8afabae12f34664a86dc41ea288b7ca817.body: Oscar Mira-Sanchez reported an integer overflow in the netsnmp_create_subtree_cache() function in agent/snmp_agent.c when processing GETBULK requests.. subTitle: A vulnerability in Net-SNMP could lead to a Denial of Service.. background: Net-SNMP is a collection of tools for generating and retrieving SNMP data.. extra: A remote attacker could send a specially crafted request to crash the SNMP server. NOTE: The attacker needs to know the community string to exploit this vulnerability.

dd34fe9e340df544fd5859a742ab7c6397883686.title: Adobe Flash Player: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 200903-23
dd34fe9e340df544fd5859a742ab7c6397883686.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Adobe Flash Player:. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been identified, the worst of which allow arbitrary code execution on a user's system via a malicious Flash file.. background: The Adobe Flash Player is a renderer for the popular SWF file format, which is commonly used to provide interactive websites, digital experiences and mobile content.. extra: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted SWF file, possibly resulting in the execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the user or a Denial of Service (crash). Furthermore a remote attacker could gain access to sensitive information, disclose memory contents by enticing a user to open a specially crafted PDF file inside a Flash application, modify the victim's clipboard or render it temporarily unusable, persuade a user into uploading or downloading files, bypass security restrictions with the assistance of the user to gain access to camera and microphone, conduct Cross-Site Scripting and HTTP Header Splitting attacks, bypass the "non-root domain policy" of Flash, and gain escalated privileges.

518d885f72acfb2eca2192c064d40e9db5811d08.title: Adobe Flash Player: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201101-09
518d885f72acfb2eca2192c064d40e9db5811d08.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were discovered in Adobe Flash Player. For further information please consult the CVE entries and the Adobe Security Bulletins referenced below.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities in Adobe Flash Player might allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a Denial of Service.. background: The Adobe Flash Player is a renderer for the SWF file format, which is commonly used to provide interactive websites.. extra: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted SWF file, possibly resulting in the execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running the application, or a Denial of Service.

0ec372828729cd7f1ca26f812d620f29a7a7f6c8.title: Graphviz: User-assisted execution of arbitrary code — GLSA 200811-04
0ec372828729cd7f1ca26f812d620f29a7a7f6c8.body: Roee Hay reported a stack-based buffer overflow in the push_subg() function in parser.y when processing a DOT file with a large number of Agraph_t elements.. subTitle: A buffer overflow in Graphviz might lead to user-assisted execution of arbitrary code via a DOT file.. background: Graphviz is an open source graph visualization software.. extra: A remote attacker could entice a user or automated system to open a specially crafted DOT file in an application using Graphviz, possibly leading to the execution of arbitrary code.

014ea8e6d4f7cb95920f3914bf8560dd0e5a686c.title: Dovecot: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 200812-16
014ea8e6d4f7cb95920f3914bf8560dd0e5a686c.body: Several vulnerabilities were found in Dovecot:. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities were found in the Dovecot mailserver.. background: Dovecot is an IMAP and POP3 server written with security primarily in mind.. extra: These vulnerabilities might allow a remote attacker to cause a Denial of Service, to circumvent security restrictions or allow local attackers to disclose the passphrase of the SSL private key.

2acbb53f2d64a57a7c63fc93a6a407a01fb89449.title: Nagios: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201702-26
2acbb53f2d64a57a7c63fc93a6a407a01fb89449.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Nagios. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in Nagios, the worst of which could lead to privilege escalation.. background: Nagios is an open source host, service and network monitoring program.. extra: A local attacker, who either is already Nagios’s system user or belongs to Nagios’s group, could potentially escalate privileges.

d2c7b50d7b8c5fb954e23b0fc727d311d8fcadbd.title: libsamplerate: User-assisted execution of arbitrary code — GLSA 200812-05
d2c7b50d7b8c5fb954e23b0fc727d311d8fcadbd.body: Russell O'Connor reported a buffer overflow in src/src_sinc.c related to low conversion ratios.. subTitle: A buffer overflow vulnerability in libsamplerate might lead to the execution of arbitrary code.. background: Secret Rabbit Code (aka libsamplerate) is a Sample Rate Converter for audio.. extra: A remote attacker could entice a user or automated system to process a specially crafted audio file possibly leading to the execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running the application.

bd6a497d965ef66a98923ac098b872d7443cb299.title: Nagios: Execution of arbitrary code — GLSA 200907-15
bd6a497d965ef66a98923ac098b872d7443cb299.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been reported in Nagios:. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities in Nagios may lead to the execution of arbitrary code.. background: Nagios is an open source host, service and network monitoring program.. extra: A remote authenticated or unauthenticated attacker may exploit these vulnerabilities to execute arbitrary commands or elevate privileges.

82b71d03b2bccd25d7ca481fce2615f1142f6bc5.title: libcdaudio: User-assisted execution of arbitrary code — GLSA 200903-31
82b71d03b2bccd25d7ca481fce2615f1142f6bc5.body: A heap-based buffer overflow has been reported in the cddb_read_disc_data() function in cddb.c when processing overly long CDDB data.. subTitle: A vulnerability in libcdaudio might allow for the remote execution of arbitrary code.. background: libcdaudio is a library of CD audio related routines.. extra: A remote attacker could entice a user to connect to a malicious CDDB server, possibly resulting in the remote execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running the application.

efbbf9ef458cd792909ea0501a9a4efe576d1b2e.title: Python: Integer overflows — GLSA 200907-16
efbbf9ef458cd792909ea0501a9a4efe576d1b2e.body: Chris Evans reported multiple integer overflows in the expandtabs method, as implemented by (1) the string_expandtabs function in Objects/stringobject.c and (2) the unicode_expandtabs function in Objects/unicodeobject.c.. subTitle: Multiple integer overflows in Python have an unspecified impact.. background: Python is an interpreted, interactive, object-oriented programming language.. extra: A remote attacker could exploit these vulnerabilities in Python applications or daemons that pass user-controlled input to vulnerable functions. The security impact is currently unknown but may include the execution of arbitrary code or a Denial of Service.

433c1d60bf4dc63b6633b4cf03cab05a74842b3a.title: VLC: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 200812-24
433c1d60bf4dc63b6633b4cf03cab05a74842b3a.body: Tobias Klein reported the following vulnerabilities:. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities in VLC may lead to the remote execution of arbitrary code.. background: VLC is a cross-platform media player and streaming server.. extra: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted CUE image file, RealMedia file or RealText subtitle file, possibly resulting in the execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running the application.

5199b488c27a9a8de3142f9492517bf2d99a5930.title: ClamAV: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 200812-21
5199b488c27a9a8de3142f9492517bf2d99a5930.body: Moritz Jodeit reported an off-by-one error within the get_unicode_name() function in libclamav/vba_extract.c when processing VBA project files (CVE-2008-5050). Ilja van Sprundel reported an infinite recursion error within the cli_check_jpeg_exploit() function in libclamav/special.c when processing JPEG files (CVE-2008-5314).. subTitle: Two vulnerabilities in ClamAV may allow for the remote execution of arbitrary code or a Denial of Service.. background: Clam AntiVirus is a free anti-virus toolkit for UNIX, designed especially for e-mail scanning on mail gateways.. extra: A remote attacker could send a specially crafted VBA or JPEG file to the clamd daemon, possibly resulting in the remote execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running the application or a Denial of Service.

b9047fa6ac0c668cb7dafcb07f0a628ac34945d8.title: OpenSSL: Certificate validation error — GLSA 200902-02
b9047fa6ac0c668cb7dafcb07f0a628ac34945d8.body: The Google Security Team reported that several functions incorrectly check the result after calling the EVP_VerifyFinal() function, allowing a malformed signature to be treated as a good signature rather than as an error. This issue affects the signature checks on DSA and ECDSA keys used with SSL/TLS.. subTitle: An error in the OpenSSL certificate chain validation might allow for spoofing attacks.. background: OpenSSL is an Open Source toolkit implementing the Secure Sockets Layer (SSL v2/v3) and Transport Layer Security (TLS v1) as well as a general purpose cryptography library.. extra: A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability and spoof arbitrary names to conduct Man-In-The-Middle attacks and intercept sensitive information.

b61f4d9e7ef52d5703333d89ce6d4bbc96cebaf7.title: Avahi: Denial of service — GLSA 200901-11
b61f4d9e7ef52d5703333d89ce6d4bbc96cebaf7.body: Hugo Dias reported a failed assertion in the originates_from_local_legacy_unicast_socket() function in avahi-core/server.c when processing mDNS packets with a source port of 0.. subTitle: A Denial of Service vulnerability has been discovered in Avahi.. background: Avahi is a system that facilitates service discovery on a local network.. extra: A remote attacker could send specially crafted packets to the daemon, leading to its crash.

56e7ea6c6e694af63abdd4072fd405faa9200102.title: OptiPNG: User-assisted execution of arbitrary code — GLSA 200812-01
56e7ea6c6e694af63abdd4072fd405faa9200102.body: A buffer overflow in the BMP reader in OptiPNG has been reported.. subTitle: A vulnerability in OptiPNG might result in user-assisted execution of arbitrary code.. background: OptiPNG is a PNG optimizer that recompresses image files to a smaller size, without losing any information.. extra: A remote attacker could entice a user to process a specially crafted BMP image, possibly resulting in the execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running the application, or a Denial of Service.

4b0b784085194a5f9b50043fc46a3c1df45d4823.title: Opera: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 200903-30
4b0b784085194a5f9b50043fc46a3c1df45d4823.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were discovered in Opera:. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities were found in Opera, the worst of which allow for the execution of arbitrary code.. background: Opera is a fast web browser that is available free of charge.. extra: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted JPEG image to cause a Denial of Service or execute arbitrary code, to process an overly long file:// URL or to open a specially crafted web page to execute arbitrary code. He could also read existing subscriptions and force subscriptions to arbitrary feed URLs, as well as inject arbitrary web script or HTML via built-in XSLT templates.

261dd115081a293ef704a979daa6387ef56c1d90.title: Imlib2: User-assisted execution of arbitrary code — GLSA 200812-23
261dd115081a293ef704a979daa6387ef56c1d90.body: Julien Danjou reported a pointer arithmetic error and a heap-based buffer overflow within the load() function of the XPM image loader.. subTitle: A buffer overflow vulnerability has been discovered in Imlib2.. background: Imlib2 is replacement library from the Enlightenment project for libraries like libXpm.. extra: A remote attacker could entice a user to process a specially crafted XPM image, possibly resulting in the remote execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running the application, or a Denial of Service.

9024a10955fd6c346ce860bc76140f9775976de3.title: noip-updater: Execution of arbitrary code — GLSA 200901-12
9024a10955fd6c346ce860bc76140f9775976de3.body: xenomuta found out that the GetNextLine() function in noip2.c misses a length check, leading to a stack-based buffer overflow.. subTitle: A buffer overflow in noip-updater can lead to arbitrary code execution.. background: noip-updater is a tool used for updating IP addresses of dynamic DNS records at no-ip.com.. extra: A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code by sending a specially crafted HTTP message to the client. NOTE: Successful exploitation requires a man in the middle attack, a DNS spoofing attack or a compromise of no-ip.com servers.

e67511d2990fcc8301ad49d4a14ee5f039605362.title: Tor: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 200904-11
e67511d2990fcc8301ad49d4a14ee5f039605362.body: A local attacker could escalate privileges by leveraging unintended supplementary group memberships of the Tor process. A remote attacker could exploit these vulnerabilities to cause a heap corruption with unknown impact and attack vectors, to cause a Denial of Service via CPU consuption or daemon crash, and to weaken anonymity provided by the service.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities in Tor might allow for heap corruption, Denial of Service, escalation of privileges and information disclosure.. background: Tor is an implementation of second generation Onion Routing, a connection-oriented anonymizing communication service.. extra: There is no known workaround at this time.

527bc8b6457c75fabe3446a3aac0188e74350d0f.title: F-PROT Antivirus: Multiple Denial of Service vulnerabilities — GLSA 200904-14
527bc8b6457c75fabe3446a3aac0188e74350d0f.body: The following vulnerabilities were found:. subTitle: Multiple errors in F-PROT Antivirus may lead to a Denial of Service.. background: F-PROT Antivirus is a multi-platform virus scanner for workstations and mail servers.. extra: A remote attacker could entice a user or automated system to scan a specially crafted file, leading to a crash or infinite loop.

20135e00f93fa416f4eef0561ec3d0393b3eca63.title: KTorrent: Multiple vulnerabilitites — GLSA 200902-05
20135e00f93fa416f4eef0561ec3d0393b3eca63.body: The web interface plugin does not restrict access to the torrent upload functionality (CVE-2008-5905) and does not sanitize request parameters properly (CVE-2008-5906) .. subTitle: Two vulnerabilities in the web interface plugin in KTorrent allow for remote execution of code and arbitrary torrent uploads.. background: KTorrent is a BitTorrent program for KDE.. extra: A remote attacker could send specially crafted parameters to the web interface that would allow for arbitrary torrent uploads and remote code execution with the privileges of the KTorrent process.

ac6222920ea702be978401e879e35d3bea003c31.title: libpng: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 200903-28
ac6222920ea702be978401e879e35d3bea003c31.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were discovered in libpng:. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities were found in libpng, which might result in the execution of arbitrary code. background: libpng is the official PNG reference library used to read, write and manipulate PNG images.. extra: A remote attacker may execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the user opening a specially crafted PNG file by exploiting the erroneous out-of-memory handling. An attacker may also exploit the png_check_keyword() error to set arbitrary memory locations to 0, if the application allows overlong, user-controlled keywords when writing PNG files. The png_handle_tEXT() vulnerability may be exploited by an attacker to potentially consume all memory on a users system when a specially crafted PNG file is opened.

5e094eea86facf3770e927698ba3331a66bfee6f.title: APR Utility Library: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 200907-03
5e094eea86facf3770e927698ba3331a66bfee6f.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in the APR Utility Library:. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities in the Apache Portable Runtime Utility Library might enable remote attackers to cause a Denial of Service or disclose sensitive information.. background: The Apache Portable Runtime Utility Library (aka apr-util) provides an interface to functionality such as XML parsing, string matching and databases connections.. extra: A remote attacker could exploit these vulnerabilities to cause a Denial of Service (crash or memory exhaustion) via an Apache HTTP server running mod_dav or mod_dav_svn, or using several configuration files. Additionally, a remote attacker could disclose sensitive information or cause a Denial of Service by sending a specially crafted input. NOTE: Only big-endian architectures such as PPC and HPPA are affected by the latter flaw.

0f11d6754cafaee1748574b62b646d1f74ed24c7.title: cURL: Arbitrary file access — GLSA 200903-21
0f11d6754cafaee1748574b62b646d1f74ed24c7.body: David Kierznowski reported that the redirect implementation accepts arbitrary Location values when CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION is enabled.. subTitle: A vulnerability in cURL may allow for arbitrary file access.. background: cURL is a command line tool for transferring files with URL syntax, supporting numerous protocols.. extra: A remote attacker could possibly exploit this vulnerability to make remote HTTP servers trigger arbitrary requests to intranet servers and read or overwrite arbitrary files via a redirect to a file: URL, or, if the libssh2 USE flag is enabled, execute arbitrary commands via a redirect to an scp: URL.

b8a8f739ca08854d4e7b18568002a285a29c6e54.title: Amarok: User-assisted execution of arbitrary code — GLSA 200903-34
b8a8f739ca08854d4e7b18568002a285a29c6e54.body: Tobias Klein has discovered multiple vulnerabilities in Amarok:. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities in Amarok might allow for user-assisted execution of arbitrary code.. background: Amarok is an advanced music player.. extra: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted Audible Audio (.aa) file with a large "nlen" or "vlen" tag value to execute arbitrary code or cause a Denial of Service.

b6e06fce28e10a81eb383e3ee3a4762dab9e0bc2.title: CUPS: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 200904-20
b6e06fce28e10a81eb383e3ee3a4762dab9e0bc2.body: The following issues were reported in CUPS:. subTitle: Multiple errors in CUPS might allow for the remote execution of arbitrary code or DNS rebinding attacks.. background: CUPS, the Common Unix Printing System, is a full-featured print server.. extra: A remote attacker might send or entice a user to send a specially crafted print job to CUPS, possibly resulting in the execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the configured CUPS user -- by default this is "lp", or a Denial of Service. Furthermore, the web interface could be used to conduct DNS rebinding attacks.

ef7fafccd1245745ad308f4daff71f5664d274f3.title: Cscope: User-assisted execution of arbitrary code — GLSA 200905-02
ef7fafccd1245745ad308f4daff71f5664d274f3.body: James Peach of Apple discovered a stack-based buffer overflow in cscope's handling of long file system paths (CVE-2009-0148). Multiple stack-based buffer overflows were reported in the putstring function when processing an overly long function name or symbol in a source code file (CVE-2009-1577).. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities in Cscope might allow for the remote execution of arbitrary code.. background: Cscope is a developer's tool for browsing source code.. extra: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted source file, possibly resulting in the remote execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running the application.

76d5993397bd3be19c401ea01e3fedf791e2ec4d.title: libsndfile: User-assisted execution of arbitrary code — GLSA 200904-16
76d5993397bd3be19c401ea01e3fedf791e2ec4d.body: Alin Rad Pop from Secunia Research reported an integer overflow when processing CAF description chunks, leading to a heap-based buffer overflow.. subTitle: A buffer overflow vulnerability in libsndfile might allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.. background: libsndfile is a C library for reading and writing files containing sampled sound.. extra: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted CAF file, resulting in the remote execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running the application.

6043891328f2fe4e368d3ae3cd144551cef4ecb3.title: Adobe Reader: User-assisted execution of arbitrary code — GLSA 200904-17
6043891328f2fe4e368d3ae3cd144551cef4ecb3.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Adobe Reader:. subTitle: Adobe Reader is vulnerable to execution of arbitrary code.. background: Adobe Reader (formerly Adobe Acrobat Reader) is a closed-source PDF reader.

b72577181ef85e53746183e82bd9bb6d8d95d996.title: GPL Ghostscript: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201412-17
b72577181ef85e53746183e82bd9bb6d8d95d996.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in GPL Ghostscript. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in GPL Ghostscript, the worst of which may allow execution of arbitrary code.. background: Ghostscript is an interpreter for the PostScript language and for PDF.. extra: A context-dependent attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted PostScript file or PDF using GPL Ghostscript, possibly resulting in execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the process or a Denial of Service condition.

851619b53ad68bc8455868205e35545cc0b10300.title: Adobe Reader: User-assisted execution of arbitrary code — GLSA 200907-06
851619b53ad68bc8455868205e35545cc0b10300.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been reported in Adobe Reader:. subTitle: Adobe Reader is vulnerable to remote code execution via crafted PDF files.. background: Adobe Reader is a PDF reader released by Adobe.. extra: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted document, possibly resulting in the execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running the application.

73d414a61ebc01b76e606a67cb4e022c927937e6.title: Ganglia: Execution of arbitrary code — GLSA 200903-22
73d414a61ebc01b76e606a67cb4e022c927937e6.body: Spike Spiegel reported a stack-based buffer overflow in the process_path() function when processing overly long pathnames in gmetad/server.c.. subTitle: A buffer-overflow in Ganglia's gmetad might lead to the execution of arbitrary code.. background: Ganglia is a scalable distributed monitoring system for clusters and grids.. extra: A remote attacker could send a specially crafted request to the gmetad service leading to the execution of arbitrary code or a Denial of Service.

46e70f6be3a8362ea9756c25330c1611d5094e36.title: Multiple Ralink wireless drivers: Execution of arbitrary code — GLSA 200907-08
46e70f6be3a8362ea9756c25330c1611d5094e36.body: Aviv reported an integer overflow in multiple Ralink wireless card drivers when processing a probe request packet with a long SSID, possibly related to an integer signedness error.. subTitle: An integer overflow in multiple Ralink wireless drivers might lead to the execution of arbitrary code with elevated privileges.. background: All listed packages are external kernel modules that provide drivers for multiple Ralink devices. ralink-rt61 is released by ralinktech.com, the other packages by the rt2x00.serialmonkey.com project.. extra: A physically proximate attacker could send specially crafted packets to a user who has wireless networking enabled, possibly resulting in the execution of arbitrary code with root privileges.

155997173398f2cdee02e7e974826283377db999.title: pam_krb5: Privilege escalation — GLSA 200903-39
155997173398f2cdee02e7e974826283377db999.body: The following vulnerabilities were discovered:. subTitle: Two vulnerabilities in pam_krb5 might allow local users to elevate their privileges or overwrite arbitrary files.. background: pam_krb5 is a a Kerberos v5 PAM module.. extra: A local attacker could set an environment variable to point to a specially crafted Kerberos configuration file and launch a PAM-based setuid application to elevate privileges, or change ownership and overwrite arbitrary files.

8e61f18849cf77af3074eab3e087c724208e730e.title: OpenSC: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 200908-01
8e61f18849cf77af3074eab3e087c724208e730e.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were found in OpenSC:. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities were found in OpenSC.. background: OpenSC provides a set of libraries and utilities to access smart cards.. extra: The first vulnerabilty allows physically proximate attackers to bypass intended PIN requirements and read private data objects. The second vulnerability allows attackers to read the cleartext form of messages that were intended to be encrypted.

20afc4dbcaf2c7d9539326bec94e2ce8a4b47a7d.title: GStreamer plug-ins: User-assisted execution of arbitrary code — GLSA 200907-11
20afc4dbcaf2c7d9539326bec94e2ce8a4b47a7d.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been reported in several GStreamer plug-ins:. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities in multiple GStreamer plug-ins might allow for the execution of arbitrary code.. background: The GStreamer plug-ins provide decoders to the GStreamer open source media framework.. extra: A remote attacker could entice a user or automated system using a GStreamer plug-in to process a specially crafted file, resulting in the execution of arbitrary code or a Denial of Service.

f1bc4e73346ee69b9257bc73db1a9c814724f79b.title: ProFTPD: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 200903-27
f1bc4e73346ee69b9257bc73db1a9c814724f79b.body: The following vulnerabilities were reported:. subTitle: Two vulnerabilities in ProFTPD might allow for SQL injection attacks.. background: ProFTPD is an advanced and very configurable FTP server.. extra: A remote attacker could send specially crafted requests to the server, possibly resulting in the execution of arbitrary SQL statements.

de4f19b589dcfdf08497cd3829c45c61f1a4907a.title: LittleCMS: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 200904-19
de4f19b589dcfdf08497cd3829c45c61f1a4907a.body: RedHat reported a null-pointer dereference flaw while processing monochrome ICC profiles (CVE-2009-0793).. subTitle: Multiple errors in LittleCMS allow for attacks including the remote execution of arbitrary code.. background: LittleCMS, or short lcms, is a color management system for working with ICC profiles. It is used by many applications including GIMP and Firefox.. extra: Chris Evans of Google discovered the following vulnerabilities:

009c80691f44d6384abaf1004bcd56b0684b3156.title: Cyrus-SASL: Execution of arbitrary code — GLSA 200907-09
009c80691f44d6384abaf1004bcd56b0684b3156.body: James Ralston reported that in certain situations, Cyrus-SASL does not properly terminate strings which can result in buffer overflows when performing Base64 encoding.. subTitle: A buffer overflow in Cyrus-SASL might allow for the execution of arbitrary code in applications or daemons that authenticate using SASL.. background: Cyrus-SASL is an implementation of the Simple Authentication and Security Layer.. extra: A remote unauthenticated user might send specially crafted packets to a daemon using Cyrus-SASL, possibly resulting in the execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running the daemon or a Denial of Service.

c5dcdbf134d6b6c2a3ba820a78b948ba2836454f.title: ISC DHCP: dhcpclient Remote execution of arbitrary code — GLSA 200907-12
c5dcdbf134d6b6c2a3ba820a78b948ba2836454f.body: The Mandriva Linux Engineering Team has reported a stack-based buffer overflow in the subnet-mask handling of dhclient.. subTitle: A buffer overflow in dhclient as included in the ISC DHCP implementation allows for the remote execution of arbitrary code with root privileges.. background: ISC DHCP is the reference implementation of the Dynamic Host Configuration Protocol as specified in RFC 2131.. extra: A remote attacker might set up a rogue DHCP server in a victim's local network, possibly leading to the execution of arbitrary code with root privileges.

642cb843eb473ae08e81b29a9857031c348b7f92.title: MIT Kerberos 5: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 200904-09
642cb843eb473ae08e81b29a9857031c348b7f92.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been reported in MIT Kerberos 5:. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities in MIT Kerberos 5 might allow remote unauthenticated users to execute arbitrary code with root privileges.. background: MIT Kerberos 5 is a suite of applications that implement the Kerberos network protocol. kadmind is the MIT Kerberos 5 administration daemon, KDC is the Key Distribution Center.. extra: A remote unauthenticated attacker could exploit the first vulnerability to cause a Denial of Service or, in unlikely circumstances, execute arbitrary code on the host running krb5kdc or kadmind with root privileges and compromise the Kerberos key database. Exploitation of the other vulnerabilities might lead to a Denial of Service in kadmind, krb5kdc, or other daemons performing authorization against Kerberos that utilize GSS-API or an information disclosure.

78380b3b12bf0cdfa7e86d6d55842272122df24e.title: FreeType: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 200905-05
78380b3b12bf0cdfa7e86d6d55842272122df24e.body: Tavis Ormandy reported multiple integer overflows in the cff_charset_compute_cids() function in cff/cffload.c, sfnt/tccmap.c and the ft_smooth_render_generic() function in smooth/ftsmooth.c, possibly leading to heap or stack-based buffer overflows.. subTitle: Multiple integer overflows in FreeType might allow for the remote execution of arbitrary code or a Denial of Service.. background: FreeType is a high-quality and portable font engine.. extra: A remote attacker could entice a user or automated system to open a specially crafted font file, possibly resulting in the execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running the application, or a Denial of Service.

64b61435ad0cae41d105c67dcb53560fa3011f41.title: Xpdf: Untrusted search path — GLSA 200904-07
64b61435ad0cae41d105c67dcb53560fa3011f41.body: Erik Wallin reported that Gentoo's Xpdf attempts to read the "xpdfrc" file from the current working directory if it cannot find a ".xpdfrc" file in the user's home directory. This is caused by a missing definition of the SYSTEM_XPDFRC macro when compiling a repackaged version of Xpdf.. subTitle: A vulnerability in Xpdf might allow local attackers to execute arbitrary code.. background: Xpdf is a PDF file viewer that runs under the X Window System.. extra: A local attacker could entice a user to run "xpdf" from a directory containing a specially crafted "xpdfrc" file, resulting in the execution of arbitrary code when attempting to, e.g., print a file.

67c0e9828216af2bc078eb57b86453b7b87ce5a3.title: phpMyAdmin: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 200906-03
67c0e9828216af2bc078eb57b86453b7b87ce5a3.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been reported in phpMyAdmin:. subTitle: Multiple errors in phpMyAdmin might allow the remote execution of arbitrary code or a Cross-Site Scripting attack.. background: phpMyAdmin is a web-based management tool for MySQL databases.. extra: A remote unauthorized attacker could exploit the first vulnerability to execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running phpMyAdmin and conduct Cross-Site Scripting attacks using the second vulnerability.

5830bbaab7fbd98065057a544b3941b2b0989eb4.title: Apache: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 200907-04
5830bbaab7fbd98065057a544b3941b2b0989eb4.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in the Apache HTTP server:. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities in the Apache HTTP daemon allow for local privilege escalation, information disclosure or Denial of Service attacks.. background: The Apache HTTP server is one of the most popular web servers on the Internet.. extra: A local attacker could circumvent restrictions put up by the server administrator and execute arbitrary commands with the privileges of the user running the Apache server. A remote attacker could send multiple requests to a server with the AJP proxy module, possibly resulting in the disclosure of a request intended for another client, or cause a Denial of Service by sending specially crafted requests to servers running mod_proxy_http or mod_deflate.

334f3d7ec072329af3685adc6fd91d3c17b404f2.title: OpenAFS: Arbitrary code execution — GLSA 201101-05
334f3d7ec072329af3685adc6fd91d3c17b404f2.body: Two vulnerabilities were discovered:. subTitle: The cache manager of OpenAFS contains several bugs resulting in remote execution of arbitrary code.. background: OpenAFS is a distributed file system.. extra: The vulnerabilities might allow remote unauthenticated attackers to cause a Denial of Service (system crash) and possibly execute arbitrary code.

c8f949d2e85dd918648cdb2e207cd38f22cab43e.title: TeX Live: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201206-28
c8f949d2e85dd918648cdb2e207cd38f22cab43e.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in texlive-core. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities were found in texlive-core, allowing attackers to execute arbitrary code.. background: TeX Live is a complete TeX distribution.. extra: These vulnerabilities might allow user-assisted remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a specially-crafted DVI file, or cause a Denial of Service.

b119a8a6570f605cf3908733bd4b3e0cc8f2421c.title: OpenSSL: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 200912-01
b119a8a6570f605cf3908733bd4b3e0cc8f2421c.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been reported in OpenSSL:. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities in OpenSSL might allow remote attackers to conduct multiple attacks, including the injection of arbitrary data into encrypted byte streams.. background: OpenSSL is an Open Source toolkit implementing the Secure Sockets Layer (SSL v2/v3) and Transport Layer Security (TLS v1) as well as a general purpose cryptography library.. extra: A remote unauthenticated attacker, acting as a Man in the Middle, could inject arbitrary plain text into a TLS session, possibly leading to the ability to send requests as if authenticated as the victim. A remote attacker could furthermore send specially crafted DTLS packages to a service using OpenSSL for DTLS support, possibly resulting in a Denial of Service. Also, a remote attacker might be able to create rogue certificates, facilitated by a MD2 collision. NOTE: The amount of computation needed for this attack is still very large.

eb68d5405f3c1fb18ac886731ee959d24ac3479c.title: Perl Compress::Raw modules: Denial of service — GLSA 200908-07
eb68d5405f3c1fb18ac886731ee959d24ac3479c.body: Leo Bergolth reported an off-by-one error in the inflate() function in Zlib.xs of Compress::Raw::Zlib, possibly leading to a heap-based buffer overflow (CVE-2009-1391).. subTitle: An off-by-one error in Compress::Raw::Zlib and Compress::Raw::Bzip2 might lead to a Denial of Service.. background: Compress::Raw::Zlib and Compress::Raw::Bzip2 are Perl low-level interfaces to the zlib and bzip2 compression libraries.. extra: Paul Marquess discovered a similar vulnerability in the bzinflate() function in Bzip2.xs of Compress::Raw::Bzip2 (CVE-2009-1884).

893eb59180edae5764a241b94596615dcfd53b20.title: GnuTLS: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 200905-04
893eb59180edae5764a241b94596615dcfd53b20.body: The following vulnerabilities were found in GnuTLS:. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities in GnuTLS might result in a Denial of Service, spoofing or the generation of invalid keys.. background: GnuTLS is an Open Source implementation of the TLS 1.0 and SSL 3.0 protocols.. extra: A remote attacker could entice a user or automated system to process a specially crafted DSA certificate, possibly resulting in a Denial of Service condition. NOTE: This issue might have other unspecified impact including the execution of arbitrary code. Furthermore, a remote attacker could spoof signatures on certificates and the "gnutls-cli" application can be tricked into accepting an invalid certificate.

ce19d74250e362f7878a4c8ec6e7f726f3ae4240.title: ModPlug: User-assisted execution of arbitrary code — GLSA 200907-07
ce19d74250e362f7878a4c8ec6e7f726f3ae4240.body: Two vulnerabilities have been reported in ModPlug:. subTitle: ModPlug contains several buffer overflows that could lead to the execution of arbitrary code.. background: ModPlug is a library for playing MOD-like music.. extra: The GStreamer Bad plug-ins (gst-plugins-bad) before 0.10.11 built a vulnerable copy of ModPlug.

8bba24a44d0bf55395911f15717ea63cdea4d8ac.title: GIMP: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201209-23
8bba24a44d0bf55395911f15717ea63cdea4d8ac.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in GIMP. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in GIMP, the worst of which allow execution of arbitrary code or Denial of Service.. background: GIMP is the GNU Image Manipulation Program.. extra: A remote attacker could possibly execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the process or cause a Denial of Service condition.

01a89acfa28c18bcd2b5ab2f3b07e51911bcd362.title: IPSec Tools: Denial of service — GLSA 200905-03
01a89acfa28c18bcd2b5ab2f3b07e51911bcd362.body: The following vulnerabilities have been found in the racoon daemon as shipped with IPSec Tools:. subTitle: Multiple errors in the IPSec Tools racoon daemon might allow remote attackers to cause a Denial of Service.. background: The IPSec Tools are a port of KAME's IPsec utilities to the Linux-2.6 IPsec implementation. They include racoon, an Internet Key Exchange daemon for automatically keying IPsec connections.. extra: A remote attacker could send specially crafted fragmented ISAKMP packets without a payload or exploit vectors related to X.509 certificate authentication and NAT traversal, possibly resulting in a crash of the racoon daemon.

bf04cac9ae31ccb4fee6ba063729215a36ba9544.title: Rasterbar libtorrent: Directory traversal — GLSA 200907-14
bf04cac9ae31ccb4fee6ba063729215a36ba9544.body: census reported a directory traversal vulnerability in src/torrent_info.cpp that can be triggered via .torrent files.. subTitle: A directory traversal vulnerability in Rasterbar libtorrent might allow a remote attacker to overwrite arbitrary files.. background: Rasterbar libtorrent is a C++ BitTorrent implementation focusing on efficiency and scalability. Deluge is a BitTorrent client that ships a copy of libtorrent.. extra: A remote attacker could entice a user or automated system using Rasterbar libtorrent to load a specially crafted BitTorrent file to create or overwrite arbitrary files using dot dot sequences in filenames.

09aa6385b65173a7a39e50990946c777b7f91416.title: libsndfile: User-assisted execution of arbitrary code — GLSA 200905-09
09aa6385b65173a7a39e50990946c777b7f91416.body: The following vulnerabilities have been found in libsndfile:. subTitle: Multiple heap-based buffer overflow vulnerabilities in libsndfile might allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.. background: libsndfile is a C library for reading and writing files containing sampled sound.. extra: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted AIFF or VOC file in a program using libsndfile, possibly resulting in the execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running the application.

13ee13307789c57eecd407fdb93f78085ebb8183.title: Adobe products: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 200908-04
13ee13307789c57eecd407fdb93f78085ebb8183.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been reported in Adobe Flash Player:. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities in Adobe Reader and Adobe Flash Player allow for attacks including the remote execution of arbitrary code.. background: Adobe Flash Player is a closed-source playback software for Flash SWF files. Adobe Reader is a closed-source PDF reader that plays Flash content as well.. extra: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted PDF file or web site containing Adobe Flash (SWF) contents, possibly resulting in the execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running the application, or a Denial of Service (application crash). Furthermore, a remote attacker could trick a user into clicking a button on a dialog by supplying a specially crafted SWF file and disclose sensitive information by exploiting a sandbox issue.

63b64ed9d2e6d664e5778cecb6f31472cd5621bb.title: ModSecurity: Denial of service — GLSA 200907-02
63b64ed9d2e6d664e5778cecb6f31472cd5621bb.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were discovered in ModSecurity:. subTitle: Two vulnerabilities in ModSecurity might lead to a Denial of Service.. background: ModSecurity is a popular web application firewall for the Apache HTTP server.. extra: A remote attacker might send requests containing specially crafted multipart data or send certain requests to access a PDF file, possibly resulting in a Denial of Service (crash) of the Apache HTTP daemon. NOTE: The PDF XSS protection is not enabled by default.

2b4621334441b8ea058eca2875d067fba6db7e95.title: Ruby: Denial of service — GLSA 200906-02
2b4621334441b8ea058eca2875d067fba6db7e95.body: Tadayoshi Funaba reported that BigDecimal in ext/bigdecimal/bigdecimal.c does not properly handle string arguments containing overly long numbers.. subTitle: A flaw in the Ruby standard library might allow remote attackers to cause a Denial of Service attack.. background: Ruby is an interpreted object-oriented programming language. The elaborate standard library includes the "BigDecimal" class.. extra: A remote attacker could exploit this issue to remotely cause a Denial of Service attack.

ab80e928a79419d3ade32a6b30b0a78f52af5b29.title: libpng: Information disclosure — GLSA 200906-01
ab80e928a79419d3ade32a6b30b0a78f52af5b29.body: Jeff Phillips discovered that libpng does not properly parse 1-bit interlaced images with width values that are not divisible by 8, which causes libpng to include uninitialized bits in certain rows of a PNG file.. subTitle: A vulnerability has been discovered in libpng that allows for information disclosure.. background: libpng is the official PNG reference library used to read, write and manipulate PNG images.. extra: A remote attacker might entice a user to open a specially crafted PNG file, possibly resulting in the disclosure of sensitive memory portions.

f1fe43494ca4e703d5b12ca01b625aab4f9375a2.title: git: git-daemon Denial of service — GLSA 200907-05
f1fe43494ca4e703d5b12ca01b625aab4f9375a2.body: Shawn O. Pearce reported that git-daemon runs into an infinite loop when handling requests that contain unrecognized arguments.. subTitle: An error in git-daemon might lead to a Denial of Service via resource consumption.. background: git - the stupid content tracker, the revision control system used by the Linux kernel team.. extra: A remote unauthenticated attacker could send a specially crafted request to git-daemon, possibly leading to a Denial of Service (CPU consumption).

eadd61bf50097b974c65d926379c50300990e103.title: libTIFF: User-assisted execution of arbitrary code — GLSA 200908-03
eadd61bf50097b974c65d926379c50300990e103.body: Two vulnerabilities have been reported in libTIFF:. subTitle: Multiple boundary checking vulnerabilities in libTIFF may allow for the remote execution of arbitrary code.. background: libTIFF provides support for reading and manipulating TIFF (Tagged Image File Format) images.. extra: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted TIFF file with an application making use of libTIFF or the tiff2rgba and rgb2ycbcr tools, possibly resulting in the execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running the application.

afddfdef4d56074ae53c55832e1c0befaab93c5e.title: libTIFF: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201209-02
afddfdef4d56074ae53c55832e1c0befaab93c5e.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in libTIFF. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities in libTIFF could result in execution of arbitrary code or Denial of Service.. background: libTIFF provides support for reading and manipulating TIFF (Tagged Image File Format) images.. extra: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted TIFF file with an application making use of libTIFF, possibly resulting in execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running the application or a Denial of Service condition.

bd3e3720f7eaba39f7a2b73329cc07926000fd70.title: CUPS: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201207-10
bd3e3720f7eaba39f7a2b73329cc07926000fd70.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in CUPS. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in CUPS, some of which may allow execution of arbitrary code or local privilege escalation.. background: CUPS, the Common Unix Printing System, is a full-featured print server.. extra: A remote attacker may be able to execute arbitrary code using specially crafted streams, IPP requests or files, or cause a Denial of Service (daemon crash or hang). A local attacker may be able to gain escalated privileges or overwrite arbitrary files. Furthermore, a remote attacker may be able to obtain sensitive information from the CUPS process or hijack a CUPS administrator authentication request.

8f103be7d9e148e3383a6f4fbe41c8c3f4f271c6.title: nginx: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201203-22
8f103be7d9e148e3383a6f4fbe41c8c3f4f271c6.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in nginx:. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in nginx, the worst of which may allow execution of arbitrary code.. background: nginx is a robust, small, and high performance HTTP and reverse proxy server.. extra: A remote attacker could possibly execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the nginx process, cause a Denial of Service condition, create or overwrite arbitrary files, or obtain sensitive information.

ad465508b4596ba0f6401160145d0ee14ca881e6.title: PEAR Net_Traceroute: Command injection — GLSA 200911-06
ad465508b4596ba0f6401160145d0ee14ca881e6.body: Pasquale Imperato reported that the $host parameter to the traceroute() function in Traceroute.php is not properly sanitized before being passed to exec().. subTitle: An input sanitation error in PEAR Net_Traceroute might allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary commands.. background: PEAR Net_Traceroute is an OS independent wrapper class for executing traceroute calls from PHP.. extra: A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability when user input is passed directly to PEAR Net_Traceroute in a PHP script, possibly resulting in the remote execution of arbitrary shell commands with the privileges of the user running the affected PHP script.

c39665d43aad80a3e9ee55cd7b9eece5f9766cdd.title: sendmail: X.509 NULL spoofing vulnerability — GLSA 201206-30
c39665d43aad80a3e9ee55cd7b9eece5f9766cdd.body: A vulnerability has been discovered in sendmail. Please review the CVE identifier referenced below for details.. subTitle: An error in the hostname matching in sendmail might enable remote attackers to conduct man-in-the-middle attacks.. background: sendmail is a widely-used Mail Transport Agent (MTA).. extra: A remote attacker might employ a specially crafted certificate to conduct man-in-the-middle attacks on SSL connections made using sendmail.

96914c8b1f24e74e58c0471c00b6f2fd42134abe.title: GNU C library: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201011-01
96914c8b1f24e74e58c0471c00b6f2fd42134abe.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were found in glibc, amongst others the widely-known recent LD_AUDIT and $ORIGIN issues. For further information please consult the CVE entries referenced below.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities were found in glibc, the worst of which allowing local attackers to execute arbitrary code as root.. background: The GNU C library is the standard C library used by Gentoo Linux systems.. extra: A local attacker could execute arbitrary code as root, cause a Denial of Service, or gain privileges. Additionally, a user-assisted remote attacker could cause the execution of arbitrary code, and a context-dependent attacker could cause a Denial of Service.

b473fb173876595f1582a5b7afbfa1fbe3cf0466.title: UnrealIRCd: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201006-21
b473fb173876595f1582a5b7afbfa1fbe3cf0466.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been reported in UnrealIRCd:. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities in UnrealIRCd might allow remote attackers to compromise the "unrealircd" account, or cause a Denial of Service.. background: UnrealIRCd is an Internet Relay Chat (IRC) daemon.. extra: A remote attacker could exploit these vulnerabilities to cause the execution of arbitrary commands with the privileges of the user running UnrealIRCd, or a Denial of Service condition. NOTE: By default UnrealIRCd on Gentoo is run with the privileges of the "unrealircd" user.

d1ebda17686d199a70665a3495d26b14a579999c.title: gif2png: User-assisted execution of arbitrary code — GLSA 201101-01
d1ebda17686d199a70665a3495d26b14a579999c.body: gif2png contains a command line parsing vulnerability that may result in a stack overflow due to an unexpectedly long input filename.. subTitle: gif2png contains a stack overflow vulnerability when parsing command line arguments.. background: gif2png is a command line program that converts image files from the Graphics Interchange Format (GIF) format to the Portable Network Graphics (PNG) format.. extra: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted image, possibly resulting in the execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running the application, or a Denial of Service. Note that applications relying on gif2png to process images can also trigger the vulnerability.

4f8f125519d6709f13d1a449acf571679ab4f840.title: OpenLDAP: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201406-36
4f8f125519d6709f13d1a449acf571679ab4f840.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in OpenLDAP. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities were found in OpenLDAP, allowing for Denial of Service or a man-in-the-middle attack.. background: OpenLDAP is an LDAP suite of application and development tools.. extra: A remote attacker might employ a specially crafted certificate to conduct man-in-the-middle attacks on SSL connections made using OpenLDAP, bypass security restrictions or cause a Denial of Service condition.

db9adccc43f8a9ffbcf438bc4de27d160c867282.title: DokuWiki: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201301-07
db9adccc43f8a9ffbcf438bc4de27d160c867282.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in DokuWiki. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities were found in DokuWiki, the worst of which leading to privilege escalation.. background: DokuWiki is a simple to use Wiki aimed at a small company’s documentation needs.. extra: The vulnerabilities might allow an attacker to disclose local files, to inject arbitrary web script, or to gain elevated privileges in the DokuWiki application.

7f20c45295e0f95743fb3a95b1c3bc3fccbc9116.title: lighttpd: Denial of service — GLSA 201006-17
7f20c45295e0f95743fb3a95b1c3bc3fccbc9116.body: Li Ming reported that lighttpd does not properly process packets that are sent overly slow.. subTitle: A processing error in lighttpd might result in a Denial of Service condition.. background: lighttpd is a lightweight high-performance web server.. extra: A remote attacker might send specially crafted packets to a server running lighttpd, possibly resulting in a Denial of Service condition via host memory exhaustion.

d8adf40147e884164212776c7d99e3cba136f9ab.title: bzip2: User-assisted execution of arbitrary code — GLSA 201301-05
d8adf40147e884164212776c7d99e3cba136f9ab.body: An integer overflow vulnerability has been discovered in bzip2. Please review the CVE identifier referenced below for details.. subTitle: An integer overflow vulnerability has been found in bzip2 and could result in execution of arbitrary code or Denial of Service.. background: bzip2 is a high-quality data compressor used extensively by Gentoo Linux.. extra: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted compressed file using bzip2, possibly resulting in execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the process, or a Denial of Service condition.

1e96e607d5565a8926ca589696cea664b8178c74.title: mount-cifs: Multiple vulnerabilites — GLSA 201206-29
1e96e607d5565a8926ca589696cea664b8178c74.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in mount-cifs. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities were found in mount-cifs, the worst of which leading to privilege escalation.. background: mount-cifs is the cifs filesystem mount helper split from Samba.. extra: The vulnerabilities allow local users to cause a denial of service (mtab corruption) via a crafted string. Also, local users could mount a CIFS share on an arbitrary mountpoint, and gain privileges via a symlink attack on the mountpoint directory file.

4de8632182a0acc89bbad1f2baf487e4a88b340b.title: GNU Tar: User-assisted execution of arbitrary code — GLSA 201111-11
