4de8632182a0acc89bbad1f2baf487e4a88b340b.body: GNU Tar is vulnerable to a boundary error in the rmt_read__ function in lib/rtapelib.c, which could cause a heap-based buffer overflow.. subTitle: A buffer overflow flaw in GNU Tar could result in execution of arbitrary code or a Denial of Service.. background: GNU Tar is a utility to create archives as well as add and extract files from archives.. extra: A remote attacker could entice the user to load a specially crafted archive, possibly resulting in the execution of arbitrary code or a Denial of Service.

bab086097e3ec31ec9b04c45a669cae61880df6b.title: cURL: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201203-02
bab086097e3ec31ec9b04c45a669cae61880df6b.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in cURL:. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in cURL, the worst of which might allow remote execution of arbitrary code.. background: cURL is a command line tool for transferring files with URL syntax, supporting numerous protocols.. extra: A remote attacker could entice a user or automated process to open a specially crafted file or URL using cURL, possibly resulting in the remote execution of arbitrary code, a Denial of Service condition, disclosure of sensitive information, or unwanted actions performed via the IMAP, POP3 or SMTP protocols. Furthermore, remote servers may be able to impersonate clients via GSSAPI requests.

a78ace933bb4f61f062027576de64c838e770142.title: PolicyKit: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201204-06
a78ace933bb4f61f062027576de64c838e770142.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in PolicyKit:. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in PolicyKit, the worst of which may allow a local attacker to gain root privileges.. background: PolicyKit is a toolkit for controlling privileges for system-wide services.. extra: A local attacker could gain elevated privileges or sensitive information.

6b6ca670bed9b8c03d2fde3c2bea7868bd1b1dec.title: fastjar: Directory traversal — GLSA 201209-21
6b6ca670bed9b8c03d2fde3c2bea7868bd1b1dec.body: Two directory traversal vulnerabilities have been discovered in fastjar. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.. subTitle: Two directory traversal vulnerabilities have been found in fastjar, allowing remote attackers to create or overwrite arbitrary files.. background: fastjar is a Java archiver written in C.. extra: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted JAR file, possibly resulting in the creation or truncation of arbitrary files.

3166927bafca470e071c7cd48586e75f033b54e2.title: Aircrack-ng: User-assisted execution of arbitrary code — GLSA 201310-06
3166927bafca470e071c7cd48586e75f033b54e2.body: A buffer overflow vulnerability has been discovered in Aircrack-ng.. subTitle: A buffer overflow vulnerability in Aircrack-ng could result in execution of arbitrary code or Denial of Service.. background: Aircrack-ng is an 802.11 WEP and WPA-PSK keys cracking program that can recover keys once enough data packets have been captured.. extra: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted dump file using Aircrack-ng, possibly resulting in execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the process or a Denial of Service condition.

92bbfdf2e8bbdd122f09dd8dcc561d80d8b883d9.title: aria2: Directory traversal — GLSA 201101-04
92bbfdf2e8bbdd122f09dd8dcc561d80d8b883d9.body: A directory traversal vulnerability was discovered in aria2.. subTitle: A directory traversal vulnerability has been found in aria2.. background: aria2 is a download utility with resuming and segmented downloading with HTTP/HTTPS/FTP/BitTorrent support.. extra: A remote attacker could entice a user to download from a specially crafted metalink file, resulting in the creation of arbitrary files.

ecdcaa8d62bb9d06a376262a08824dfe122a1540.title: SWFTools: User-assisted execution of arbitrary code — GLSA 201204-05
ecdcaa8d62bb9d06a376262a08824dfe122a1540.body: Integer overflow errors in the "getPNG()" function in png.c and the "jpeg_load()" function in jpeg.c could cause a heap-based buffer overflow.. subTitle: A heap-based buffer overflow in SWFTools could result in the execution of arbitrary code.. background: SWFTools is a collection of SWF manipulation and generation utilities written by Rainer Böhme and Matthias Kramm.. extra: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted PNG or JPEG file, possibly resulting in execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the process, or a Denial of Service condition.

412b8dfe18c0d3cda1b979f0f48744f20b4e34a5.title: sudo: Privilege Escalation — GLSA 201009-03
412b8dfe18c0d3cda1b979f0f48744f20b4e34a5.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been reported in sudo:. subTitle: The secure path feature and group handling in sudo allow local attackers to escalate privileges.. background: sudo allows a system administrator to give users the ability to run commands as other users.. extra: A local attacker could exploit these vulnerabilities to gain the ability to run certain commands with the privileges of other users, including root, depending on the configuration.

b1c66aae0187de667487e54980cf78662f3bd5e5.title: Quagga: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201202-02
b1c66aae0187de667487e54980cf78662f3bd5e5.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Quagga. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities were found in Quagga, the worst of which leading to remote execution of arbitrary code.. background: Quagga is a free routing daemon replacing Zebra supporting RIP, OSPF and BGP.. extra: A BGP peer could send a Route-Refresh message with specially-crafted ORF record, which can cause Quagga's bgpd to crash or possibly execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running Quagga's bgpd; a BGP update AS path request with unknown AS type, or malformed AS-Pathlimit or Extended-Community attributes could lead to Denial of Service (daemon crash), an error in bgpd when handling AS_PATH attributes within UPDATE messages can be exploited to cause a heap-based buffer overflow resulting in a crash of the daemon and disruption of IPv4 routing, two errors in ospf6d and ospfd can each be exploited to crash the daemon and disrupt IP routing.

b2abd97d35cec4007a8c8c7caab32c698cb50be7.title: Tor: Remote heap-based buffer overflow — GLSA 201101-02
b2abd97d35cec4007a8c8c7caab32c698cb50be7.body: Tor contains a heap-based buffer overflow in the processing of user or attacker supplied data. No additional information is available.. subTitle: Tor is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow that may allow arbitrary code execution.. background: Tor is an implementation of second generation Onion Routing, a connection-oriented anonymizing communication service.. extra: Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may allow an unauthenticated remote attacker to execute arbitrary code with the permissions of the Tor user, or to cause a Denial of Service.

cf03deeab2170a2898a72693204e3dd8e968aad3.title: Prewikka: password disclosure — GLSA 201101-07
cf03deeab2170a2898a72693204e3dd8e968aad3.body: The permissions of the prewikka.conf file are set world readable.. subTitle: Due to a world-readable file, a local attacker can obtain the SQL database password used by Prewikka.. background: Prewikka is a graphical front-end analysis console for the Prelude Hybrid IDS Framework.. extra: A local attacker could obtain the SQL database password used by Prewikka.

6122780918aac39dd1017c22873372f4bc8c34f1.title: libmikmod: User-assisted execution of arbitrary code — GLSA 201203-10
6122780918aac39dd1017c22873372f4bc8c34f1.body: Multiple boundary errors have been found in load_it.c in libmikmod, which may cause a buffer overflow.. subTitle: Multiple buffer overflow vulnerabilities in libmikmod may allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code or cause a Denial of Service condition.. background: libmikmod is a library to play a wide range of module formats.. extra: A remote attacker could entice a user to open specially crafted files in an application linked against libmikmod, possibly resulting in execution of arbitrary code with the permissions of the user running the application, or Denial of Service.

9eb2f920c1849031ed969296412533fc196752d6.title: T1Lib: : Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201701-57
9eb2f920c1849031ed969296412533fc196752d6.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in T1Lib. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in T1Lib, the worst of which could lead to remote execution of arbitrary code.. background: T1Lib is a library for rasterizing bitmaps from Adobe Type 1 fonts.. extra: Remote attackers, by coercing users to process specially crafted AFM font or PDF file, could cause a Denial of Service condition or execute arbitrary code.

f960e453ab8d4170460c62a0cabe9864b5ac8d42.title: IcedTea JDK: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201406-32
f960e453ab8d4170460c62a0cabe9864b5ac8d42.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in the IcedTea JDK. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in the IcedTea JDK, the worst of which could lead to arbitrary code execution.. background: IcedTea is a distribution of the Java OpenJDK source code built with free build tools.. extra: A remote attacker could possibly execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the process, cause a Denial of Service condition, obtain sensitive information, bypass intended security policies, or have other unspecified impact.

8ff853e8b48a43dbb59be0150df0a8ef6902f75d.title: Adobe Reader: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201101-08
8ff853e8b48a43dbb59be0150df0a8ef6902f75d.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were discovered in Adobe Reader. For further information please consult the CVE entries and the Adobe Security Bulletins referenced below.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities in Adobe Reader might result in the execution of arbitrary code.. background: Adobe Reader (formerly Adobe Acrobat Reader) is a closed-source PDF reader.. extra: A remote attacker might entice a user to open a specially crafted PDF file, possibly resulting in the execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running the application, or a Denial of Service.

04bc662003c42407e8c5ea1852d9eb6cc63f181e.title: MantisBT: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201211-01
04bc662003c42407e8c5ea1852d9eb6cc63f181e.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in MantisBT. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in MantisBT, the worst of which allowing for local file inclusion.. background: MantisBT is a PHP/MySQL/Web based bugtracking system.. extra: A remote attacker could exploit these vulnerabilities to conduct directory traversal attacks, disclose the contents of local files, inject arbitrary web scripts, obtain sensitive information, bypass authentication and intended access restrictions, or manipulate bugs and attachments.

f2afc0888e0a0774e34cff55416801643702da55.title: Quassel: Multiple Vulnerabilities — GLSA 201311-03
f2afc0888e0a0774e34cff55416801643702da55.body: Two vulnerabilities have been found in Quassel:. subTitle: Two vulnerabilities in Quassel may result in Denial of Service or SQL injection.. background: Quassel is a Qt4/KDE4 IRC client suppporting a remote daemon for 24/7 connectivity.. extra: A remote attacker could send multiple CTCP requests in single private message, possibly resulting in a Denial of Service condition. Futhermore, a remote attacker may be able to execute arbitrary SQL statements.

3512f6b09dd63ae9602d3075ce4032a148455bb4.title: libvpx: User-assisted execution of arbitrary code — GLSA 201101-03
3512f6b09dd63ae9602d3075ce4032a148455bb4.body: libvpx is vulnerable to an integer overflow vulnerability when processing crafted VP8 video streams.. subTitle: Timothy B. Terriberry discovered that libvpx contains an integer overflow vulnerability in the processing of video streams that may allow user-assisted execution of arbitrary code.. background: libvpx is the VP8 codec SDK used to encode and decode video streams, typically within a WebM format media file.. extra: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted media file, possibly resulting in the execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running the application, or a Denial of Service.

61683c91ebd21c56517b4fed95284fcae8f63184.title: HPLIP: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201203-17
61683c91ebd21c56517b4fed95284fcae8f63184.body: Two vulnerabilities have been found in HPLIP:. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in HPLIP, the worst of which may allow execution of arbitrary code.. background: The Hewlett-Packard Linux Imaging and Printing system (HPLIP) provides drivers for HP's inkjet and laser printers, scanners and fax machines.. extra: A remote attacker might send specially crafted SNMP reponses, possibly resulting in execution of arbitrary code or a Denial of Service condition. Furthermore, a local attacker could perform symlink attacks to overwrite arbitrary files.

7eb771c18e87bd8f247122f9ed5fdc846fd41f62.title: Poppler: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201310-03
7eb771c18e87bd8f247122f9ed5fdc846fd41f62.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Poppler. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in Poppler, some of which may allow execution of arbitrary code.. background: Poppler is a cross-platform PDF rendering library originally based on Xpdf.. extra: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted PDF file, possibly resulting in execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the process or a Denial of Service condition.

6569d2629b66eb85ff3a76ee8633ca6270136226.title: gif2png: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201203-15
6569d2629b66eb85ff3a76ee8633ca6270136226.body: Two vulnerabilities have been found in gif2png:. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in gif2png, the worst of which might allow execution of arbitrary code.. background: gif2png converts images from GIF format to PNG format.. extra: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted GIF file, possibly resulting in execution of arbitrary code, a Denial of Service condition, or the creation of PNG files in unintended directories.

bf69ca21e3a2c7a36aa131dd788ec6fade1cc0fb.title: Linux-PAM: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201206-31
bf69ca21e3a2c7a36aa131dd788ec6fade1cc0fb.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Linux-PAM. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in Linux-PAM, allowing local attackers to possibly gain escalated privileges, cause a Denial of Service, corrupt data, or obtain sensitive information.. background: Linux-PAM (Pluggable Authentication Modules) is an architecture allowing the separation of the development of privilege granting software from the development of secure and appropriate authentication schemes.. extra: A local attacker could use specially crafted files to cause a buffer overflow, possibly resulting in privilege escalation or Denial of Service. Furthermore, a local attacker could execute specially crafted programs or symlink attacks, possibly resulting in data loss or disclosure of sensitive information.

da73397738947017b66a269e4e19b867960668ac.title: Echoping: Buffer Overflow Vulnerabilities — GLSA 201406-07
da73397738947017b66a269e4e19b867960668ac.body: A boundary error exists within the “TLS_readline()” function, which can be exploited to overflow a global buffer by sending an overly long encrypted HTTP reply to Echoping. Also, a similar boundary error exists within the “SSL_readline()” function, which can be exploited in the same manner.. subTitle: A buffer overflow in Echoping might allow remote attackers to cause a Denial of Service condition.. background: Echoping is a small program to test performances of a remote host by sending it TCP packets.. extra: A remote attacker could send a specially crafted HTTP reply, possibly resulting in a Denial of Service condition.

78a3d61a771324e02709c7bfc9c024b515242a95.title: sudo: Privilege escalation — GLSA 201203-06
78a3d61a771324e02709c7bfc9c024b515242a95.body: Two vulnerabilities have been discovered in sudo:. subTitle: Two vulnerabilities have been discovered in sudo, allowing local attackers to possibly gain escalated privileges.. background: sudo allows a system administrator to give users the ability to run commands as other users.. extra: A local attacker could possibly gain the ability to run arbitrary commands with the privileges of other users or groups, including root.

5fd0078f4a9fbb0c3e03cd13cb39fb7b34421ebc.title: Postfix: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201206-33
5fd0078f4a9fbb0c3e03cd13cb39fb7b34421ebc.body: A vulnerability have been discovered in Postfix. Please review the CVE identifier referenced below for details.. subTitle: A vulnerability has been found in Postfix, the worst of which possibly allowing remote code execution.. background: Postfix is Wietse Venema’s mailer that attempts to be fast, easy to administer, and secure, as an alternative to the widely-used Sendmail program.. extra: An attacker could perform a man-in-the-middle attack and inject SMTP commands during the plaintext to TLS session switch or might execute arbitrary code.

85a6a4cdefacbb0159a9f06c179634bad56e0849.title: nbd: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201206-35
85a6a4cdefacbb0159a9f06c179634bad56e0849.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in nbd. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities were found in nbd, which could lead to remote execution of arbitrary code.. background: nbd is a userland client/server for kernel network block device.. extra: nbd allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (NULL pointer dereference and crash) or the execution of arbitrary code.

403e179fe95a21221e80c284af097126ea7cab2d.title: dhcpcd: Arbitrary code execution — GLSA 201301-04
403e179fe95a21221e80c284af097126ea7cab2d.body: A vulnerability has been discovered in dhcpcd. Please review the CVE identifier referenced below for details.. subTitle: A vulnerability has been found in dhcpcd, allowing remote attackers to execute arbitrary code on the DHCP client.. background: dhcpcd is a fully featured, yet light weight RFC2131 compliant DHCP client.. extra: The vulnerability might allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code on the DHCP client.

9422eb042652e75bef9fa3a7706ed4f2e1f5df2e.title: ISC DHCP: Denial of service — GLSA 201301-06
9422eb042652e75bef9fa3a7706ed4f2e1f5df2e.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in ISC DHCP. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in ISC DHCP, the worst of which may allow remote Denial of Service.. background: ISC DHCP is a Dynamic Host Configuration Protocol (DHCP) client/server.. extra: The vulnerabilities might allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a Denial of Service.

64d6eb390a691983bed6e11511909002e1eeeb67.title: Urban Terror: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201706-23
64d6eb390a691983bed6e11511909002e1eeeb67.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Urban Terror. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in Urban Terror, the worst of which allows for the remote execution of arbitrary code.. background: Urban Terror is a free multiplayer first person shooter developed by FrozenSand, that will run on any Quake III Arena compatible engine.. extra: A remote attacker could entice a user to connect to a malicious server or leverage Man-in-the-Middle attacks to cause the execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the process or a Denial of Service condition.

6f3948c6dacb4f9b34585f80f3e4d690d15b2c66.title: rdesktop: Directory Traversal — GLSA 201210-03
6f3948c6dacb4f9b34585f80f3e4d690d15b2c66.body: A vulnerability has been discovered in rdesktop. Please review the CVE identifier referenced below for details.. subTitle: A vulnerability which allows a remote attacking server to read or overwrite arbitrary files has been found in rdesktop.. background: rdesktop is a Remote Desktop Protocol (RDP) Client.. extra: Remote RDP servers may be able to read or overwrite arbitrary files via a .. (dot dot) in a pathname.

c97fa66c40cadcee193ad762ee8d8fa4d72ddcaa.title: Zend Framework: SQL injection — GLSA 201408-01
c97fa66c40cadcee193ad762ee8d8fa4d72ddcaa.body: Developers using non-ASCII-compatible encodings in conjunction with the MySQL PDO driver of PHP may be vulnerable to SQL injection attacks.. subTitle: A vulnerability in Zend Framework could allow a remote attacker to inject SQL commands.. background: Zend Framework is a high quality and open source framework for developing Web Applications.. extra: A remote attacker could use specially crafted input to execute arbitrary SQL statements.

683cfd8445ec69f9bdba328f317f3a53335096c2.title: tftp-hpa: Remote buffer overflow — GLSA 201206-12
683cfd8445ec69f9bdba328f317f3a53335096c2.body: A vulnerability has been discovered in tftp-hpa. Please review the CVE identifier referenced below for details.. subTitle: A vulnerability was found in tftp-hpa, which leads to remote execution of arbitrary code.. background: tftp-hpa is the port of the OpenBSD TFTP server.. extra: The vulnerability might allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.

68a5e2d231b928727055500eaff956080dfa2338.title: Adobe Flash Player: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201204-07
68a5e2d231b928727055500eaff956080dfa2338.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Adobe Flash Player. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities in Adobe Flash Player, the worst of which might allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.. background: The Adobe Flash Player is a renderer for the SWF file format, which is commonly used to provide interactive websites.. extra: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted SWF file, possibly resulting in execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the process or a Denial of Service condition. Furthermore, a remote attacker may be able to bypass intended access restrictions, bypass cross-domain policy, inject arbitrary web script, or obtain sensitive information.

ea8a994d502e30c47cef4aec8d8124e4580c89ef.title: libpng: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201206-15
ea8a994d502e30c47cef4aec8d8124e4580c89ef.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in libpng:. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities in libpng might allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a Denial of Service condition.. background: libpng is a standard library used to process PNG (Portable Network Graphics) images. It is used by several programs, including web browsers and potentially server processes.. extra: An attacker could exploit these vulnerabilities to execute arbitrary code with the permissions of the user running the vulnerable program, which could be the root user, or to cause programs linked against the library to crash.

3840d669c6039fcd16ef53e9f8929078b392ca69.title: foomatic-filters: User-assisted execution of arbitrary code — GLSA 201203-07
3840d669c6039fcd16ef53e9f8929078b392ca69.body: The foomatic-rip filter improperly handles command-line arguments, including those issued by FoomaticRIPCommandLine fields in PPD files.. subTitle: A vulnerability in foomatic-filters could result in the execution of arbitrary code.. background: The foomatic-filters package contains wrapper scripts which are designed to be used with Foomatic.. extra: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted PPD file, possibly resulting in execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the system user "lp".

d7310704033912a6432e4f67dfa2a8b17dfb20b9.title: LibreOffice: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201209-05
d7310704033912a6432e4f67dfa2a8b17dfb20b9.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in LibreOffice:. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in LibreOffice, allowing remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a Denial of Service.. background: LibreOffice is a full office productivity suite.. extra: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted document file using LibreOffice, possibly resulting in execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the process or a Denial of Service condition.

d87cf45a6086351ee58d878dcab745672d9c04c3.title: Xen: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201309-24
d87cf45a6086351ee58d878dcab745672d9c04c3.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Xen. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in Xen, allowing attackers on a Xen Virtual Machine to execute arbitrary code, cause Denial of Service, or gain access to data on the host.. background: Xen is a bare-metal hypervisor.. extra: Guest domains could possibly gain privileges, execute arbitrary code, or cause a Denial of Service on the host domain (Dom0). Additionally, guest domains could gain information about other virtual machines running on the same host or read arbitrary files on the host.

4da15aab23d8f35f35487ff90ab208f1d1785f50.title: Chromium: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201203-19
4da15aab23d8f35f35487ff90ab208f1d1785f50.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Chromium. Please review the CVE identifiers and release notes referenced below for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been reported in Chromium, some of which may allow execution of arbitrary code.. background: Chromium is an open source web browser project.. extra: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted web site using Chromium, possibly resulting in the execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the process, a Denial of Service condition, Universal Cross-Site Scripting, or installation of an extension without user interaction.

8f0f09ad0eaf12f75589fd7d716228c7c81f4134.title: Chromium: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201204-03
8f0f09ad0eaf12f75589fd7d716228c7c81f4134.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Chromium. Please review the CVE identifiers and release notes referenced below for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been reported in Chromium, some of which may allow execution of arbitrary code.. background: Chromium is an open source web browser project.. extra: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted web site using Chromium, possibly resulting in the execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the process, a Denial of Service condition, or bypass of the same origin policy.

876cddf464055f33ebd63473b43c9212463c8d18.title: Chromium: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201205-01
876cddf464055f33ebd63473b43c9212463c8d18.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Chromium. Please review the CVE identifiers and release notes referenced below for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been reported in Chromium, some of which may allow execution of arbitrary code.. background: Chromium is an open source web browser project.. extra: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted web site using Chromium, possibly resulting in the execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the process, or a Denial of Service condition.

95a2744d656aa6ad2a17bb9bbf697d6050c79de0.title: Chromium, V8: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201205-03
95a2744d656aa6ad2a17bb9bbf697d6050c79de0.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Chromium and V8. Please review the CVE identifiers and release notes referenced below for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been reported in Chromium and V8, some of which may allow execution of arbitrary code.. background: Chromium is an open source web browser project. V8 is Google’s open source JavaScript engine.. extra: A context-dependent attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted web site or JavaScript program using Chromium or V8, possibly resulting in the execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the process, or a Denial of Service condition.

879d54d200e3d330c6a92fe11bc1c49d7897de81.title: Chromium, V8: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201205-04
879d54d200e3d330c6a92fe11bc1c49d7897de81.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Chromium and V8. Please review the CVE identifiers and release notes referenced below for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been reported in Chromium and V8, some of which may allow execution of arbitrary code.. background: Chromium is an open source web browser project. V8 is Google’s open source JavaScript engine.. extra: A context-dependent attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted web site or JavaScript program using Chromium or V8, possibly resulting in the execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the process, or a Denial of Service condition.

19e4fc85fca4d02be340831471daa04a2c6dcb7e.title: QtGui: User-assisted execution of arbitrary code — GLSA 201206-02
19e4fc85fca4d02be340831471daa04a2c6dcb7e.body: An error in qtiffhandler.cpp could cause a buffer overflow.. subTitle: A buffer overflow in QtGui could result in execution of arbitrary code or Denial of Service.. background: QtGui is a module for the Qt toolkit.. extra: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted TIFF image with an application linked against QtGui, possibly resulting in execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the process or a Denial of Service condition.

edd719243d83dd6680664320c7f7b511a507251f.title: MPlayer: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201310-13
edd719243d83dd6680664320c7f7b511a507251f.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in MPlayer and the bundled FFmpeg. Please review the CVE identifiers and FFmpeg GLSA referenced below for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in MPlayer and the bundled FFmpeg, the worst of which may lead to the execution of arbitrary code.. background: MPlayer is a media player including support for a wide range of audio and video formats.. extra: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a crafted media file to execute arbitrary code or cause a Denial of Service.

b51b16fb27ced521c2cde37a0856292cf1901c23.title: Logsurfer: Arbitrary code execution — GLSA 201201-04
b51b16fb27ced521c2cde37a0856292cf1901c23.body: Logsurfer log files may contain substrings used for executing external commands. The prepare_exec() function in src/exec.c contains a double-free vulnerability.. subTitle: A double-free flaw in Logsurfer allows a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code.. background: Logsurfer is a real time log monitoring and analysis tool.. extra: A remote attacker could inject specially-crafted strings into a log file processed by Logsurfer, resulting in the execution of arbitrary code with the permissions of the Logsurfer user.

09aab67ffbfe900178cac13ca7f1dc3f298a4aed.title: PLIB: Buffer overflow vulnerability — GLSA 201606-16
09aab67ffbfe900178cac13ca7f1dc3f298a4aed.body: A buffer overflow in PLIB allows user-assisted remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via vectors involving a long error message, as demonstrated by a crafted acc file for TORCS.. subTitle: A buffer overflow in PLIB might allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.. background: PLIB includes sound effects, music, a complete 3D engine, font rendering, a simple Windowing library, a game scripting language, a GUI, networking, 3D math library and a collection of handy utility functions.. extra: Remote attackers could execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the process.

6c5bcce182c0a99b255ad71a8aa33786e38ccfa2.title: libfpx: Denial of service — GLSA 201605-03
6c5bcce182c0a99b255ad71a8aa33786e38ccfa2.body: A double free vulnerability has been discovered in the Free_All_Memory function in jpeg/dectile.c.. subTitle: A double free vulnerability has been discovered in libfpx that allows remote attackers to cause a Denial of Service.. background: A library for manipulating FlashPIX images.. extra: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted FPX image using an application linked against libfpx, possibly resulting in a Denial of Service condition.

5e6da3bb01fe4289a643286919453221d95db72a.title: socat: Arbitrary code execution — GLSA 201208-01
5e6da3bb01fe4289a643286919453221d95db72a.body: A vulnerability in the "xioscan_readline()" function in xio-readline.c could cause a heap-based buffer overflow.. subTitle: A buffer overflow in socat might allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.. background: socat is a multipurpose bidirectional relay, similar to netcat.. extra: A remote attacker could possibly execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the socat process.

c2d3fdcfa72a55c2dd0731702941eab2474a10a3.title: MySQL: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201308-06
c2d3fdcfa72a55c2dd0731702941eab2474a10a3.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in MySQL. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in MySQL, allowing attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause Denial of Service.. background: MySQL is a fast, multi-threaded, multi-user SQL database server.. extra: A remote attacker could send a specially crafted request, possibly resulting in execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the application or a Denial of Service condition.

704fc15dba9fae3b415c268df6b748847ad67711.title: spamdyke: Arbitrary code execution — GLSA 201203-01
704fc15dba9fae3b415c268df6b748847ad67711.body: Boundary errors related to the "snprintf()" and "vsnprintf()" functions in spamdyke could cause a buffer overflow.. subTitle: A buffer overflow in spamdyke might allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.. background: spamdyke is a drop-in connection-time spam filter for qmail.. extra: A remote attacker could possibly execute arbitrary code or cause a Denial of Service.

6ed2c67cc1098e18b845b25174127624c311f2fe.title: CVS: Heap-based overflow — GLSA 201701-44
6ed2c67cc1098e18b845b25174127624c311f2fe.body: A heap-based buffer overflow was discovered in the proxy_connect function in src/client.c in CVS.. subTitle: A heap-based buffer overflow in CVS might allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.. background: CVS (Concurrent Versions System) is an open-source network-transparent version control system. It contains both a client utility and a server.. extra: An attacker, utilizing a remote HTTP proxy server, could cause a Denial of Service condition or possibly execute arbitrary code via a crafted HTTP response.

a5b159bfc996de9744114d59895f67cb81ed68c7.title: Postfixadmin: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201209-18
a5b159bfc996de9744114d59895f67cb81ed68c7.body: Multiple SQL injection vulnerabilities (CVE-2012-0811) and cross-site scripting vulnerabilities (CVE-2012-0812) have been found in Postfixadmin.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in Postfixadmin which may lead to SQL injection or cross-site scripting attacks.. background: Postfixadmin is a web-based management tool for Postfix-style virtual domains and users.. extra: A remote attacker could exploit these vulnerabilities to execute arbitrary SQL statements or arbitrary HTML and script code.

959e211029b19d5c37433851e6321a05edea1bc5.title: FreeType: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201204-04
959e211029b19d5c37433851e6321a05edea1bc5.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in FreeType. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in FreeType, allowing remote attackers to possibly execute arbitrary code or cause Denial of Service.. background: FreeType is a high-quality and portable font engine.. extra: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted font, possibly resulting in execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running the application, or a Denial of Service condition.

5fdce485157d6799e9d617af46f6351ac1a87d12.title: OpenJPEG: User-assisted execution of arbitrary code — GLSA 201206-06
5fdce485157d6799e9d617af46f6351ac1a87d12.body: An error in jp2.c of OpenJPEG could allow an out-of-bounds write error.. subTitle: A vulnerability in OpenJPEG could result in execution of arbitrary code.. background: OpenJPEG is an open-source JPEG 2000 library.. extra: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted JPEG file, possibly resulting in execution of arbitrary code or a Denial of Service condition.

72a636a800509dd42677fccb9e9c6c01455c1d39.title: PyPAM: Arbitrary code execution — GLSA 201507-09
72a636a800509dd42677fccb9e9c6c01455c1d39.body: PyPAM does not handle passwords correctly if there is NULL byte in the string.. subTitle: A double free vulnerability in PyPAM could result in execution of arbitrary code or Denial of Service.. background: PyPAM is a PAM binding for Python.. extra: A remote attacker could possibly execute arbitrary code or cause a Denial of Service condition.

f97c9ea5cfc42be84e3874d980a0328be7354869.title: Adobe Reader: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201308-03
f97c9ea5cfc42be84e3874d980a0328be7354869.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Adobe Reader. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in Adobe Reader, including potential remote execution of arbitrary code and local privilege escalation.. background: Adobe Reader is a closed-source PDF reader.. extra: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted PDF file, possibly resulting in arbitrary code execution or a Denial of Service condition. A local attacker could gain privileges via unspecified vectors.

6f4cc36b92f61f0f774df2550c0ed502dbd28256.title: Atheme IRC Services: Denial of service — GLSA 201209-09
6f4cc36b92f61f0f774df2550c0ed502dbd28256.body: The “myuser_delete()” function in account.c does not properly remove CertFP entries when deleting user accounts.. subTitle: A vulnerability has been found in Atheme which may lead to Denial of Service or a bypass of security restrictions.. background: Atheme is a portable and secure set of open-source and modular IRC services. CertFP is certificate fingerprinting used to authenticate users to nicknames.. extra: A remote authenticated attacker may be able to cause a Denial of Service condition or gain access to an Atheme IRC Services user account.

dbafc6945bfff92660952e3ee2ffddef62f533b7.title: ArgyllCMS: User-assisted execution of arbitrary code — GLSA 201206-04
dbafc6945bfff92660952e3ee2ffddef62f533b7.body: ArgyllCMS does not properly handle ICC profiles causing a use-after-free vulnerability.. subTitle: A vulnerability has been found in ArgyllCMS which could allow attackers to execute arbitrary code.. background: ArgyllCMS is an ICC compatible color management system that supports accurate ICC profile creation for scanners, cameras and film recorders.. extra: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted image file using ArgyllCMS, possibly resulting in execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the process, or a Denial of Service condition.

a50f5acfe35e3d7f73caabee4c2a3525fbb5902d.title: Gajim: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201208-04
a50f5acfe35e3d7f73caabee4c2a3525fbb5902d.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Gajim. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in Gajim, the worst of which may allow execution of arbitrary code.. background: Gajim is a Jabber and XMPP client written in PyGTK.. extra: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted link using Gajim, possibly resulting in execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the process or a Denial of Service condition. Furthermore, a remote attacker could use a specially crafted Jabber ID, possibly resulting in execution of arbitrary SQL statements.

a1f3821d8a421626414efc8ebf71ea2ed2ca6ce3.title: FlightGear, SimGear: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201603-12
a1f3821d8a421626414efc8ebf71ea2ed2ca6ce3.body: SimGear is a set of open-source libraries designed to be used as building blocks for quickly assembling 3d simulations, games, and visualization applications.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in FlightGear and SimGear allowing remote attackers to cause Denial of Service and possibly execute arbitrary code.. background: FlightGear is an open-source flight simulator. It supports a variety of popular platforms (Windows, Mac, Linux, etc.) and is developed by skilled volunteers from around the world. Source code for the entire project is available and licensed under the GNU General Public License.. extra: Multiple format string vulnerabilities in FlightGear and SimGear allow user-assisted remote attackers to cause a denial of service and possibly execute arbitrary code via format string specifiers in certain data chunk values in an aircraft xml model.

acd90a6ee3494e12e35aa43e66fbdedb301f8e6f.title: ConnMan: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201205-02
acd90a6ee3494e12e35aa43e66fbdedb301f8e6f.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in ConnMan:. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in ConnMan, allowing attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause Denial of Service.. background: ConnMan provides a daemon for managing Internet connections.. extra: A remote attacker could execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the process or cause a Denial of Service condition.

10e17f0b49a518df6bb84f663aea7e487be892b9.title: Boost: Buffer overflow — GLSA 202105-04
10e17f0b49a518df6bb84f663aea7e487be892b9.body: It was discovered that Boost incorrectly sanitized ‘next_size’ and ‘max_size’ parameter in ordered_malloc() function when allocating memory.. subTitle: A buffer overflow in Boost might allow remote attacker(s) to execute arbitrary code.. background: Boost is a set of C++ libraries, including the Boost.Regex library to process regular expressions.. extra: A remote attacker could provide a specially crafted application-specific file (requiring runtime memory allocation to be processed correctly), that, when opened with an application using Boost C++ source libraries, possibly resulting in execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the process or a Denial of Service condition.

99a13e20a2326cce24536c4ee9f6520338eb7e03.title: libjpeg-turbo: User-assisted execution of arbitrary code — GLSA 201209-13
99a13e20a2326cce24536c4ee9f6520338eb7e03.body: A vulnerability in the get_sos() function in jdmarker.c could cause a heap-based buffer overflow.. subTitle: A vulnerability in libjpeg-turbo could result in execution of arbitrary code or Denial of Service.. background: libjpeg-turbo accelerates JPEG compression and decompression.. extra: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted JPEG file in an application linked against libjpeg-turbo, possibly resulting in the remote execution of arbitrary code with the permissions of the user running the application, or Denial of Service.

220d1d4228957693dbf6c9f17a65f1cff472c3a1.title: HAProxy: Arbitrary code execution — GLSA 201301-02
220d1d4228957693dbf6c9f17a65f1cff472c3a1.body: A boundary error in HAProxy could cause a buffer overflow when header rewriting is enabled and the configuration sets global.tune.bufsize to a value greater than the default (16384 bytes).. subTitle: A buffer overflow in HAProxy may allow execution of arbitrary code.. background: HAProxy is a TCP/HTTP reverse proxy for high availability environments.. extra: A remote attacker could possibly execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the process or cause a Denial of Service condition.

3334bd1bc231806d43f598cf88cc00956875ad31.title: GNU C Library: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201503-04
3334bd1bc231806d43f598cf88cc00956875ad31.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in the GNU C Library. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in GNU C Library, the worst of which allowing a local attacker to execute arbitrary code or cause a Denial of Service .. background: The GNU C library is the standard C library used by Gentoo Linux systems.. extra: A local attacker may be able to execute arbitrary code or cause a Denial of Service condition,.

1dd9095cbb534a2f2d21e23f9f04d8bb836a4960.title: Bash: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201210-05
1dd9095cbb534a2f2d21e23f9f04d8bb836a4960.body: Two vulnerabilities have been found in Bash:. subTitle: Two vulnerabilities have been found in Bash, the worst of which may allow execution of arbitrary code.. background: Bash is the standard GNU Bourne Again SHell.. extra: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted Bash script, possibly resulting in execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the process, or a Denial of Service condition of the Bash executable.

d6c2dfc47205403adf06852f0c252a7794e05e59.title: Xen: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201604-03
d6c2dfc47205403adf06852f0c252a7794e05e59.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Xen. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in Xen, the worst of which cause a Denial of Service.. background: Xen is a bare-metal hypervisor.. extra: A local attacker could possibly cause a Denial of Service condition or obtain sensitive information.

b509f02a1355c8284bc1c9b8fbb66dd46068769c.title: Tor: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201301-03
b509f02a1355c8284bc1c9b8fbb66dd46068769c.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Tor. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in Tor, allowing attackers to cause Denial of Service or obtain sensitive information.. background: Tor is an implementation of second generation Onion Routing, a connection-oriented anonymizing communication service.. extra: A remote attacker could cause a Denial of Service condition or obtain sensitive information.

36650af50d14eda94e0d439d3022f49a5a3cf298.title: SQUASHFS: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201612-40
36650af50d14eda94e0d439d3022f49a5a3cf298.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in SQUASHFS. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in SQUASHFS, the worst of which may allow execution of arbitrary code.. background: Squashfs is a compressed read-only filesystem for Linux. Squashfs is intended for general read-only filesystem use, for archival use (i.e. in cases where a .tar.gz file may be used), and in constrained block device/memory systems (e.g. embedded systems) where low overhead is needed.. extra: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted .sqsh file using unsquashfs; possibly resulting in the execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the process, or a Denial of Service condition.

5cb896973758c939d594bd372f76151f4ae2337e.title: Adobe Flash Player: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201209-01
5cb896973758c939d594bd372f76151f4ae2337e.body: Multiple unspecified vulnerabilities have been discovered in Adobe Flash Player. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in Adobe Flash Player, the worst of which could result in execution of arbitrary code.. background: The Adobe Flash Player is a renderer for the SWF file format, which is commonly used to provide interactive websites.. extra: A remote attacker could entice a user to open specially crafted SWF content, possibly resulting in execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the process, or a Denial of Service condition. Furthermore, a remote attacker may be able to obtain sensitive information.

dabaeca9f49b5582638aad70ea48db7166830fdf.title: NVIDIA Drivers: Privilege escalation — GLSA 201304-01
dabaeca9f49b5582638aad70ea48db7166830fdf.body: Two vulnerabilities have been discovered in NVIDIA drivers:. subTitle: Two vulnerabilities in NVIDIA drivers may allow a local attacker to gain escalated privileges.. background: The NVIDIA drivers provide X11 and GLX support for NVIDIA graphic boards.. extra: NOTE: Exposure to CVE-2012-4225 is reduced in Gentoo due to 660 permissions being used on the GPU device nodes by default.

ae0bbea20643b9714be5f36c43583a8b9535d8c0.title: GIMP: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201603-01
ae0bbea20643b9714be5f36c43583a8b9535d8c0.body: GIMP’s network server, scriptfu, is vulnerable to the remote execution of arbitrary code via the python-fu-eval command due to not requiring authentication. Additionally, the X Window Dump (XWD) plugin is vulnerable to multiple buffer overflows possibly allowing the remote execution of arbitrary code or Denial of Service. The XWD plugin is vulnerable due to not validating large color entries.. subTitle: GIMP is vulnerable to multiple buffer overflows which could result in the execution of arbitrary code or Denial of Service.. background: GIMP is a cross-platform image editor available for GNU/Linux, OS X, Windows and more operating systems.. extra: A remote attacker could possibly execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the process due or perform a Denial of Service.

a9d9964870f179737bac9df1ee8aa65abea06ee9.title: OpenSLP: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201707-05
a9d9964870f179737bac9df1ee8aa65abea06ee9.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in OpenSLP. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in OpenSLP, the worst of which allows remote attackers to cause a Denial of Service condition or other unspecified impacts.. background: OpenSLP is an open-source implementation of Service Location Protocol (SLP).. extra: A remote attacker could possibly cause a Denial of Service condition or have other unspecified impacts.

82633c5bd947966c511bea72a27fa835d178f4cf.title: Xlockmore: Denial of service — GLSA 201309-03
82633c5bd947966c511bea72a27fa835d178f4cf.body: A Denial of Service flaw was found in the way Xlockmore performed the passing of arguments to the underlying localtime() call, when the ‘dlock’ mode was used.. subTitle: A buffer overflow in Xlockmore might allow remote attackers to cause a Denial of Service.. background: Xlockmore is just another screensaver application for X.. extra: A local attacker could possibly cause a Denial of Service condition and potentially obtain unauthorized access to the graphical session, previously locked by another user.

94d824b1b84429341289bbdfb5fe9895734e4df4.title: Gajim: Information disclosure — GLSA 201401-02
94d824b1b84429341289bbdfb5fe9895734e4df4.body: The _ssl_verify_callback() function in tls_nb.py does not properly validate SSL certificates, causing any certificate to be accepted as valid as long as the root CA is valid.. subTitle: An error in Gajim causes invalid OpenSSL certificates to be accepted as valid.. background: Gajim is a Jabber/XMPP client which uses GTK+.. extra: A remote attacker might employ a specially crafted certificate to conduct man-in-the-middle attacks on SSL connections and potentially disclose sensitive information.

892e5958c3070f0f6fcc44dd452cf3fb1c8f7cf6.title: Samba: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201502-15
892e5958c3070f0f6fcc44dd452cf3fb1c8f7cf6.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Samba. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in Samba, the worst of which allowing a context-dependent attacker to bypass intended file restrictions, cause a Denial of Service or execute arbitrary code.. background: Samba is a suite of SMB and CIFS client/server programs.. extra: A context-dependent attacker may be able to execute arbitrary code, cause a Denial of Service condition, bypass intended file restrictions, or obtain sensitive information.

54edefe85e8215ba973d6cdd85a3c3304f9bb394.title: Snack: User-assisted execution of arbitrary code — GLSA 201309-04
54edefe85e8215ba973d6cdd85a3c3304f9bb394.body: The GetWavHeader() function in jkSoundFile.c does not have boundary checks when parsing format sub-chunks or unknown sub-chunks.. subTitle: A buffer overflow in Snack could result in execution of arbitrary code or Denial of Service.. background: Snack is a sound toolkit for creating multi-platform audio applications with scripting languages.. extra: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted WAV file with an application using Snack, possibly resulting in execution of arbitrary code or a Denial of Service condition.

f7fa1d90b03d858decc9b917c2214c5dc476c8f8.title: Active Record: SQL injection — GLSA 201401-22
f7fa1d90b03d858decc9b917c2214c5dc476c8f8.body: An Active Record method parameter can mistakenly be used as a scope.. subTitle: A vulnerability in Active Record could allow a remote attacker to inject SQL commands.. background: Active Record is a Ruby gem that allows database entries to be manipulated as objects.. extra: A remote attacker could use specially crafted input to execute arbitrary SQL statements.

fb82eef78d5b3930386f5ca25a90942d8b897296.title: InspIRCd: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201512-13
fb82eef78d5b3930386f5ca25a90942d8b897296.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in InspIRCd. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in InspIRCd, the worst allowing remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.. background: InspIRCd is a modular Internet Relay Chat (IRC) server written in C++ which was created from scratch to be stable, modern and lightweight.. extra: A remote attacker could possibly execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the process, or cause a Denial of Service condition.

985c04c2eee6453d3210a038534dea6a1b5831e3.title: Expat: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201701-21
985c04c2eee6453d3210a038534dea6a1b5831e3.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Expat. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in Expat, the worst of which may allow execution of arbitrary code.. background: Expat is a set of XML parsing libraries.. extra: A remote attacker, by enticing a user to process a specially crafted XML file, could execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the process or cause a Denial of Service condition. This attack could also be used against automated systems that arbitrarily process XML files.

2ba176d2450c8e5a626754ebd1c728e4a5f08583.title: RAR and UnRAR: User-assisted execution of arbitrary code — GLSA 201708-05
2ba176d2450c8e5a626754ebd1c728e4a5f08583.body: A VMSF_DELTA memory corruption was discovered in which an integer overflow can be caused in DataSize+CurChannel. The result is a negative value of the “DestPos” variable which allows writing out of bounds when setting Mem[DestPos].. subTitle: An integer overflow in RAR and UnRAR might allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.. background: RAR and UnRAR provide command line interfaces for compressing and decompressing RAR files.. extra: A remote attacker, by enticing a user to open a specially crafted archive, could execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the process.

7377025ee895a2bf503eb14a34cd472303dcf4a5.title: RAR, UnRAR: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201709-24
7377025ee895a2bf503eb14a34cd472303dcf4a5.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in RAR and UnRAR. Please review the referenced CVE identifiers for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in RAR and UnRAR, the worst of which may allow attackers to execute arbitrary code.. background: RAR and UnRAR provide command line interfaces for compressing and decompressing RAR files.. extra: A remote attacker, by enticing a user to open a specially crafted RAR, could possibly execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the process or cause a Denial of Service condition.

33c2e077acb5750c3c8b64f000cfda04b487aa0e.title: ClamAV: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201804-16
33c2e077acb5750c3c8b64f000cfda04b487aa0e.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in ClamAV. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in ClamAV, the worst of which may allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.. background: ClamAV is a GPL virus scanner.. extra: A remote attacker, through multiple vectors, could execute arbitrary code, cause a Denial of Service condition, or have other unspecified impacts.

72a2a68b88921a297370f7680506a1c0ad0db206.title: isync: Man-in-the-Middle attack — GLSA 201310-02
72a2a68b88921a297370f7680506a1c0ad0db206.body: isync does not properly verify the server’s hostname against the CN field in the SSL certificate.. subTitle: A vulnerability in isync could allow remote attackers to perform man-in-the-middle attacks.. background: isync is an IMAP and MailDir mailbox synchronizer.. extra: A remote server could perform man-in-the-middle attacks to disclose passwords or obtain other sensitive information.

ec3d8d551cbc8cd75c6f50358157a1530105bb15.title: Bundler: Insecure installation — GLSA 201609-02
ec3d8d551cbc8cd75c6f50358157a1530105bb15.body: Bundler, allows the installation of gems from different sources with the same names, when multiple top-level gem sources are used.. subTitle: A vulnerability has been found in Bundler, allowing injection of arbitrary code via the gem installation process.. background: Bundler provides a consistent environment for Ruby projects by tracking and installing the exact gems and versions that are needed.. extra: Remote attackers could inject arbitrary code via the gem install process.

c7d38e98a0ece078126816b30f9311f6bacf113d.title: nginx: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201310-04
c7d38e98a0ece078126816b30f9311f6bacf113d.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in nginx. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in nginx, the worst of which may allow execution of arbitrary code.. background: nginx is a robust, small, and high performance HTTP and reverse proxy server.. extra: A remote attacker could send a specially crafted request, possibly resulting in execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the process, or a Denial of Service condition. Furthermore, a context-dependent attacker may be able to obtain sensitive information.

d81811b9b82a7c51dc225ee7db3a809be2a921a8.title: Zabbix: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201311-15

Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in Zabbix, possibly leading to SQL injection attacks, Denial of Service, or information disclosure.. background: Zabbix is software for monitoring applications, networks, and servers.. extra: A remote attacker may be able to execute arbitrary SQL statements, cause a Denial of Service condition, or obtain sensitive information.

e698d5963b0a4f4430d87a0368036026d2f9270b.title: xmonad-contrib: Arbitrary code execution — GLSA 201405-28
e698d5963b0a4f4430d87a0368036026d2f9270b.body: A vulnerability in the Xmonad.Hooks.DynamicLog module could allow a malicious website with a specially crafted title to inject commands into the title bar which would be executed when the bar is clicked.. subTitle: A remote command injection vulnerability has been discovered in xmonad-contrib.. background: xmonad-contrib is a set of third party tiling algorithms, configurations, and scripts for xmonad.. extra: A remote attacker could possibly execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the process or cause a Denial of Service condition.

3be46152154d7d503cde5ad2725af6b90dfab2ff.title: Xen: Multiple Vunlerabilities — GLSA 201407-03
3be46152154d7d503cde5ad2725af6b90dfab2ff.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Xen. 91363941fe97a9a2b688f8411faecc713c94954e.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in the Mozilla Network Security Service. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for more details about the vulnerabilities.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Mozilla Network Security Service, the worst of which could lead to Denial of Service.. background: The Mozilla Network Security Service is a library implementing security features like SSL v2/v3, TLS, PKCS #5, PKCS #7, PKCS #11, PKCS #12, S/MIME and X.509 certificates.. extra: A remote attacker can cause a Denial of Service condition.

527bc749169431bf2cfc3c37adb77c58e25880df.title: Mozilla Products: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201504-01
527bc749169431bf2cfc3c37adb77c58e25880df.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Firefox, Thunderbird, and SeaMonkey. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in Mozilla Firefox, Thunderbird, and SeaMonkey, the worst of which may allow user-assisted execution of arbitrary code.. background: Mozilla Firefox is an open-source web browser and Mozilla Thunderbird an open-source email client, both from the Mozilla Project. The SeaMonkey project is a community effort to deliver production-quality releases of code derived from the application formerly known as the ‘Mozilla Application Suite’.. extra: A remote attacker could entice a user to view a specially crafted web page or email, possibly resulting in execution of arbitrary code or a Denial of Service condition. Furthermore, a remote attacker may be able to perform Man-in-the-Middle attacks, obtain sensitive information, spoof the address bar, conduct clickjacking attacks, bypass security restrictions and protection mechanisms, or have other unspecified impact.

bb8ad568705ccfa02e473828f626b4f357a4b921.title: MySQL: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201409-04
bb8ad568705ccfa02e473828f626b4f357a4b921.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in MySQL. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in MySQL, worst of which allows local attackers to escalate their privileges.. background: MySQL is a popular multi-threaded, multi-user SQL server.. extra: A local attacker could possibly gain escalated privileges. A remote attacker could send a specially crafted SQL query, possibly resulting in a Denial of Service condition. A remote attacker could entice a user to connect to specially crafted MySQL server, possibly resulting in execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the process.

d91cf1e669265f58c241c113a0a3d5acc06497cb.title: Chicken: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201612-54
d91cf1e669265f58c241c113a0a3d5acc06497cb.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Chicken. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in Chicken, the worst of which allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.. background: Chicken is a scheme interpreter and native scheme to C compiler.. extra: A remote attacker could possibly execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the process, or cause a Denial of Service condition.

e1fc988d0c8501b49a5e478d4aa6fcab2e1d05b2.title: Portage: Man-in-the-middle attack — GLSA 201507-16
e1fc988d0c8501b49a5e478d4aa6fcab2e1d05b2.body: Portage does not verify X.509 SSL certificates properly if HTTPS is used.. subTitle: A vulnerability in Portage's urlopen function could allow a remote attacker to conduct a man-in-the-middle attack.. background: Portage is the package management and distribution system for Gentoo.. extra: A remote attacker can spoof servers and modify binary package lists via specially crafted certificates.

44f03d116afe4d81cfe3b1733338207836d8d15e.title: TPP: User-assisted execution of arbitrary code — GLSA 201309-19
44f03d116afe4d81cfe3b1733338207836d8d15e.body: TPP templates may contain a --exec clause, the contents of which are automatically executed without confirmation from the user.. subTitle: A vulnerability in TPP might allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code.. background: TPP is an ncurses-based text presentation tool.. extra: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted file using TPP, possibly resulting in execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the user.

Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in Xen, the worst of which can allow remote attackers to cause a Denial of Service condition.. background: Xen is a bare-metal hypervisor.. extra: A local attacker could possibly cause a Denial of Service condition or obtain sensitive information.

5a8d6beb74fac54af9acf9b092e5dd47c6a244c7.title: Firebird: Buffer Overflow — GLSA 201512-11
5a8d6beb74fac54af9acf9b092e5dd47c6a244c7.body: The vulnerability is caused due to an error when processing requests from remote clients.. subTitle: A buffer overflow in Firebird might allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.. background: Firebird is a multi-platform, open source relational database.. extra: A remote attacker could possibly execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the process, or cause a Denial of Service condition.

0ade7ac25deb5d2d52bb71837751de262f544700.title: Cyrus-SASL: Denial of service — GLSA 201309-01
0ade7ac25deb5d2d52bb71837751de262f544700.body: In the GNU C Library (glibc) from version 2.17 onwards, the crypt() function call can return NULL when the salt violates specifications or the system is in FIPS-140 mode and a DES or MD5 hashed password is passed. When Cyrus-SASL’s authentication mechanisms call crypt(), a NULL may be returned.. subTitle: A NULL pointer dereference in Cyrus-SASL may allow remote attackers to cause a Denial of Service condition.. background: Cyrus-SASL is an implementation of the Simple Authentication and Security Layer.. extra: A remote attacker could trigger this vulnerability to cause a Denial of Service condition.

a92e54d9bcfd407b0458d9fafe914dc8d8f618c7.title: libTIFF: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201701-16
a92e54d9bcfd407b0458d9fafe914dc8d8f618c7.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in libTIFF. Please review the CVE identifier and bug reports referenced for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in libTIFF, the worst of which may allow execution of arbitrary code.. background: The TIFF library contains encoding and decoding routines for the Tag Image File Format. It is called by numerous programs, including GNOME and KDE applications, to interpret TIFF images.. extra: A remote attacker could entice a user to process a specially crafted image file, possibly resulting in execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the process or a Denial of Service condition.

503287843ea4bf256a1bdb6e3c3996172a457f4b.title: libvirt: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201412-04
503287843ea4bf256a1bdb6e3c3996172a457f4b.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in libvirt. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in libvirt, worst of which allows context-dependent attackers to escalate privileges.. background: libvirt is a C toolkit for manipulating virtual machines.. extra: A remote attacker may be able to cause a Denial of Service or cause information leakage. A local attacker may be able to escalate privileges, cause a Denial of Service or possibly execute arbitrary code.

c8d7bf7b537ae1c6739dbbf2fbe5223fdd19ec4f.title: xinetd: Privilege escalation — GLSA 201611-06
c8d7bf7b537ae1c6739dbbf2fbe5223fdd19ec4f.body: Xinetd does not enforce the user and group configuration directives for TCPMUX services, which causes these services to be run as root.. subTitle: A vulnerability in xinetd could lead to privilege escalation.. background: xinetd is a secure replacement for inetd.. extra: Attackers could escalate privileges outside of the running process.

4e3032fe864ba4ccb95b861929749ef99ed36197.title: DavFS2: Local privilege escalation — GLSA 201612-02
4e3032fe864ba4ccb95b861929749ef99ed36197.body: DavFS2 installs “/usr/sbin/mount.davfs” as setuid root. This utility uses “system()” to call “/sbin/modprobe”.. subTitle: A vulnerability in DavFS2 allows local users to gain root privileges.. background: DavFS2 is a file system driver that allows you to mount a WebDAV server as a local disk drive.. extra: While the call to “modprobe” itself cannot be manipulated, a local authenticated user can set the “MODPROBE_OPTIONS” environment variable to pass a user controlled path, allowing the loading of an arbitrary kernel module.

bb38e781475a0c5b7314efd64db19db73c61ec86.title: X2Go Server: Arbitrary code execution — GLSA 201310-19
bb38e781475a0c5b7314efd64db19db73c61ec86.body: A vulnerability in the setgid wrapper x2gosqlitewrapper.c does not hardcode an internal path to x2gosqlitewrapper.pl, allowing a remote attacker to change that path.. subTitle: A path vulnerability in X2Go Server may allow remote execution of arbitrary code.. background: X2Go is an open source terminal server project.. extra: A remote attacker may be able to execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running the server process.

bbc41e74d2008c276401a53c5f48eb8d4652916d.title: systemd: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201612-34
bbc41e74d2008c276401a53c5f48eb8d4652916d.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in systemd. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in systemd, the worst of which may allow execution of arbitrary code.. background: A system and service manager.. extra: An attacker could possibly execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the process, cause a Denial of Service condition, or gain escalated privileges.

afb96561fa2eb9d7be530b48b083f55414a33a06.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Poppler. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in Poppler, allowing remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a Denial of Service condition.. background: Poppler is a cross-platform PDF rendering library originally based on Xpdf.. extra: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted PDF in an application linked against Poppler, possibly resulting in execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the process or a Denial of Service condition.

729e7ed648f8bbf78bcae0cdab6b283f98b34447.title: libgadu: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201508-02
729e7ed648f8bbf78bcae0cdab6b283f98b34447.body: libgadu contains multiple vulnerabilities:. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in libgadu, the worst of which may result in execution of arbitrary code.. background: libgadu is a library that implements the client side of the Gadu-Gadu protocol.. extra: A remote attacker may be able to execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the process, cause a Denial of Service condition, or spoof servers.

e196d1931818d7e834eb784d1c3107bcc4be3457.title: Apache: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201504-03
e196d1931818d7e834eb784d1c3107bcc4be3457.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Apache HTTP Server. 5f9330dfbd55397c2ac7b3cb833d5fcf7f4d7ae9.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in X.Org X Server.
