4552bc3d307193581d24acab77f554d73736fb10.title: X.Org Server: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201710-30
4552bc3d307193581d24acab77f554d73736fb10.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in X.Org Server. Please review the referenced CVE identifiers for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in X.Org Server the worst of which could allow a local attacker to replace shared memory segments.. background: The X.Org project provides an open source implementation of the X Window System.. extra: A local attacker could cause a global buffer overflow or a Denial of Service condition.

b455a1b7eb8139e5e65bfdcb6e0a51a6524d8dbf.title: Apache HTTP Server: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201408-12
b455a1b7eb8139e5e65bfdcb6e0a51a6524d8dbf.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in Apache HTTP Server. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Apache HTTP Server, the worse of which could lead to execution of arbitrary code or a Denial of Service condition. background: Apache HTTP Server is one of the most popular web servers on the Internet.. extra: A remote attacker could send a specially crafted request to possibly execute arbitrary code, cause Denial of Service, or obtain sensitive information.

86229e77e21b4001768db14d903e29350b6ad524.title: OpenSSL: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201412-39
86229e77e21b4001768db14d903e29350b6ad524.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in OpenSSL. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in OpenSSL, the worst of which could result in Denial of Service or Man-in-the-Middle attacks.. background: OpenSSL is an Open Source toolkit implementing the Secure Sockets Layer (SSL v2/v3) and Transport Layer Security (TLS v1) as well as a general purpose cryptography library.. extra: A remote attacker may be able to cause a Denial of Service condition, perform Man-in-the-Middle attacks, obtain sensitive information, or bypass security restrictions.

4ece94fc4c8a285f529345f325e8c48428669837.title: libjpeg-turbo: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201606-03
4ece94fc4c8a285f529345f325e8c48428669837.body: libjpeg-turbo does not check for certain duplications of component data during the reading of segments that follow Start Of Scan (SOS) JPEG markers.. subTitle: Two vulnerabilities have been discovered in libjpeg-turbo, the worse of which could allow remote attackers access to sensitive information.. background: libjpeg-turbo is a MMX, SSE, and SSE2 SIMD accelerated JPEG library. extra: Remote attackers could obtain sensitive information from uninitialized memory locations via a crafted JPEG images.

aace47275961b98eaa4837e8997f4f929bd755f3.title: Zabbix: Shell command injection — GLSA 201401-26
aace47275961b98eaa4837e8997f4f929bd755f3.body: If a flexible user parameter is configured in Zabbix agent, including a newline in the parameters will execute newline section as a separate command even if UnsafeUserParameters are disabled.. subTitle: A vulnerability in Zabbix could allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary shell code.. background: Zabbix is software for monitoring applications, networks, and servers.. extra: A remote attacker could possibly execute arbitrary shell code with the privileges of the process.

1f526034bd2a32b19b0f6e90445a7d9ad7830a58.title: GNU libmicrohttpd: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201402-01
1f526034bd2a32b19b0f6e90445a7d9ad7830a58.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in GNU libmicrohttpd. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in GNU libmicrohttpd, the worst of which may allow execution of arbitrary code.. background: GNU libmicrohttpd is a small C library that is supposed to make it easy to run an HTTP server as part of another application.. extra: A remote attacker could execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the process, cause a Denial of Service condition, or obtain sensitive information.

5fd59913fc4d3ee1cf1c541a25aea6a67b3d2cde.title: Linux-PAM: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201605-05
5fd59913fc4d3ee1cf1c541a25aea6a67b3d2cde.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Linux-PAM. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in Linux-PAM, allowing remote attackers to bypass the auth process and cause Denial of Service.. background: Linux-PAM (Pluggable Authentication Modules) is an architecture allowing the separation of the development of privilege granting software from the development of secure and appropriate authentication schemes.. extra: Remote attackers could cause Denial of Service, conduct brute force attacks, and conduct username enumeration.

3fbacdaf1cc7f5cefc69b68183ccc54bf59deb92.title: ClamAV: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201405-08
3fbacdaf1cc7f5cefc69b68183ccc54bf59deb92.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in ClamAV. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in ClamAV, the worst of which could lead to arbitrary code execution.. background: Clam AntiVirus (ClamAV) is an anti-virus toolkit for UNIX, designed especially for e-mail scanning on mail gateways.. extra: A remote attacker could send a specially crafted file, leading to arbitrary code execution or a Denial of Service condition.

d52251640ea6f928e95f497397136029b398aac6.title: kwalletd: Information disclosure — GLSA 201606-19
d52251640ea6f928e95f497397136029b398aac6.body: Kwalletd in KWallet uses Blowfish with ECB mode instead of CBC mode when encrypting the password store.. subTitle: Kwalletd password stores are vulnerable to codebook attacks.. background: Kwalletd is is a credentials management application for KDE.. extra: Local attackers, with access to the password store, could conduct a codebook attack in order to obtain confidential passwords.

d168ba76ae280d5564477e35c85838fdd53d76d5.title: Python: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201503-10
d168ba76ae280d5564477e35c85838fdd53d76d5.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Python. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in Python, the worst of which could lead to arbitrary code execution.. background: Python is an interpreted, interactive, object-oriented programming language.. extra: A context-dependent attacker may be able to execute arbitrary code or cause a Denial of Service condition.

34a06b774be78a802a9138ffa5f7c3fa663ba91b.title: X2Go Server: Privilege Escalation — GLSA 201405-26
34a06b774be78a802a9138ffa5f7c3fa663ba91b.body: X2Go Server is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability.. subTitle: A local privilege escalation vulnerability has been discovered in X2Go Server.. background: X2Go is an open source terminal server project.. extra: A local attacker could gain escalated privileges.

cf72da75a827f5f5b95041ff727650f34347bcc7.title: c-icap: Denial of service — GLSA 201409-07
cf72da75a827f5f5b95041ff727650f34347bcc7.body: c-icap contains a flaw in the parse_request() function of request.c that may allow a remote denial of service. The issue is triggered when the buffer fails to contain a ‘ ‘ or ‘?’ symbol, which will cause the end pointer to increase and surpass allocated memory. With a specially crafted request (e.g. via the OPTIONS method), a remote attacker can cause a loss of availability for the program.. subTitle: A vulnerability in c-icap could result in Denial of Service.. background: c-icap is an implementation of an ICAP server. It can be used with HTTP proxies that support the ICAP protocol to implement content adaptation and filtering services.. extra: A remote attacker may cause a Denial of Service condition.

8dceada34a6ac4df0554dbed139780a981a9c790.title: Perl: Denial of service — GLSA 201507-11
8dceada34a6ac4df0554dbed139780a981a9c790.body: S_regmatch() function lacks proper checks before passing arguments to atoi(). subTitle: A vulnerability in Perl allows a remote attacker to cause Denial of Service.. background: Perl is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language.. extra: A remote attacker could send a specially crafted input, possibly resulting in a Denial of Service condition.

aa723e7d915b217639c1f9d25822c26088fee085.title: PyCrypto: Remote execution of arbitrary code — GLSA 201702-14
aa723e7d915b217639c1f9d25822c26088fee085.body: A heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability has been discovered in PyCrypto. Please review the CVE identifier referenced below for details.. subTitle: A heap-based buffer overflow in PyCrypto might allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.. background: The Python Cryptography Toolkit (PyCrypto) is a collection of both secure hash functions (such as SHA256 and RIPEMD160), and various encryption algorithms (AES, DES, RSA, ElGamal, etc.).. extra: A remote attacker, able to control the mode of operation in PyCrypto’s AES module, could possibly execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the process or cause a Denial of Service condition.

8901c8b162484a78ce7cdc709c068a4aeb5739e3.title: Subversion, Serf: Multiple Vulnerabilities — GLSA 201610-05
8901c8b162484a78ce7cdc709c068a4aeb5739e3.body: The serf library is a high performance C-based HTTP client library built upon the Apache Portable Runtime (APR) library.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in Subversion and Serf, the worst of which could lead to execution of arbitrary code.. background: Subversion is a version control system intended to eventually replace CVS. Like CVS, it has an optional client-server architecture (where the server can be an Apache server running mod_svn, or an ssh program as in CVS’s :ext: method). In addition to supporting the features found in CVS, Subversion also provides support for moving and copying files and directories.. extra: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Subversion and Serf. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details

ac28e16c47f72aa1631d5b99e0f503fffba7427d.title: Xalan-Java: Arbitrary code execution — GLSA 201604-02
ac28e16c47f72aa1631d5b99e0f503fffba7427d.body: The TransformerFactory in Apache Xalan-Java does not properly restrict access to certain properties when FEATURE_SECURE_PROCESSING is enabled. This can also be exploited via a Java property that is bound to the XSLT 1.0 system-property function.. subTitle: Insufficient constraints in Apache's Xalan-Java might allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code and load arbitrary classes.. background: Xalan-Java is an XSLT processor for transforming XML documents into HTML, text, or other XML document types.. extra: A remote attacker could inject specially crafted XSLT properties resulting in the execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the process.

10dd52039cb3fb27101d23cd6c46469bb08b3da4.title: Commons-BeanUtils: Arbitrary code execution — GLSA 201607-09
10dd52039cb3fb27101d23cd6c46469bb08b3da4.body: Apache Commons BeanUtils does not suppress the class property, which allows for the manipulation of the ClassLoader.. subTitle: Apache Commons BeanUtils does not properly suppress the class property, which could lead to the remote execution of arbitrary code.. background: Commons-beanutils provides easy-to-use wrappers around Reflection and Introspection APIs. extra: Remote attackers could potentially execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the process.

4eb338c8651775a9d5ed30bf57b731f2155d75c5.title: elfutils: Heap-based buffer overflow — GLSA 201612-32
4eb338c8651775a9d5ed30bf57b731f2155d75c5.body: An integer overflow, in the check_section function of dwarf_begin_elf.c, in the libdw library can lead to a heap-based buffer overflow.. subTitle: A heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability in elfutils might allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.. background: Elfutils provides a library and utilities to access, modify and analyse ELF objects.. extra: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted file, possibly resulting in the execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the process or a Denial of Service condition.

6c6125856f9aba1137ce09c567681efad88a1d2e.title: OpenSSL: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201407-05
6c6125856f9aba1137ce09c567681efad88a1d2e.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in OpenSSL. Please review the OpenSSL Security Advisory [05 Jun 2014] and the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in OpenSSL, possibly allowing remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.. background: OpenSSL is an Open Source toolkit implementing the Secure Sockets Layer (SSL v2/v3) and Transport Layer Security (TLS v1) as well as a general purpose cryptography library.. extra: A remote attacker could send specially crafted DTLS fragments to an OpenSSL DTLS client or server to possibly execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the process using OpenSSL.

3b23567dc937ab5758cf10581820681364ab2adc.title: FreeRDP: User-assisted execution of arbitrary code — GLSA 201412-18
3b23567dc937ab5758cf10581820681364ab2adc.body: FreeRDP does not properly validate user-supplied input, which could lead to an integer overflow in the xf_Pointer_New() function.. subTitle: An integer overflow in FreeRDP couuld result in execution of arbitrary code or Denial of Service.. background: FreeRDP is a free implementation of the remote desktop protocol.. extra: A remote attacker could execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the process or cause Denial of Service.

e6eb3229991d885d0c5a2f23023701b93771cd51.title: GNU C Library: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201602-02
e6eb3229991d885d0c5a2f23023701b93771cd51.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in the GNU C Library:. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in the GNU C library, the worst allowing for remote execution of arbitrary code.. background: The GNU C library is the standard C library used by Gentoo Linux systems.. extra: Please review the CVEs referenced below for additional vulnerabilities that had already been fixed in previous versions of sys-libs/glibc, for which we have not issued a GLSA before.

8b3ee969a87d51c0619cc38cc6d8ccb1fbe44ef2.title: chkrootkit: Local privilege escalation — GLSA 201709-05
8b3ee969a87d51c0619cc38cc6d8ccb1fbe44ef2.body: When /tmp is mounted without the noexec option chkrootkit will execute files in /tmp with root privileges.. subTitle: A vulnerability in chkrootkit may allow local users to gain root privileges.. background: chkrootkit is a tool to locally check for signs of a rootkit.. extra: A local attacker could possibly execute arbitrary code with root privileges.

a990719c737262a84b85491dafc5f1a19bbfc693.title: Adobe Flash Player: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201405-04
a990719c737262a84b85491dafc5f1a19bbfc693.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Adobe Flash Player. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in Adobe Flash Player, the worst of which could result in execution of arbitrary code.. background: The Adobe Flash Player is a renderer for the SWF file format, which is commonly used to provide interactive websites.. extra: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted SWF file using Adobe Flash Player, possibly resulting in execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the process or a Denial of Service condition. Furthermore, a remote attacker may be able to bypass the Same Origin Policy or read the clipboard via unspecified vectors.

b9ad4dfd8edd44c43e5882d806494fffcdbf2873.title: Adobe Flash Player: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201409-05
b9ad4dfd8edd44c43e5882d806494fffcdbf2873.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Adobe Flash Player. 2190148fd66362a1be920de7de21b1f6d3444cc6.title: Graphviz: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201702-06
2190148fd66362a1be920de7de21b1f6d3444cc6.body: Multiple vulnerabilities in Graphviz were discovered. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in Graphviz and the extent of these vulnerabilities are unspecified.. background: Graphviz is an open source graph visualization software.. extra: A remote attacker, able to control input matched against a regular expression or by enticing a user to process a specially crafted file, could cause unspecified impacts.

4a5267df113f33416aa786bb0711e874c9629a04.title: VirtualBox: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201612-27
4a5267df113f33416aa786bb0711e874c9629a04.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in VirtualBox. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in VirtualBox, the worst of which allows local users to escalate privileges.. background: VirtualBox is a powerful virtualization product from Oracle.. extra: Local attackers could cause a Denial of Service condition, execute arbitrary code, or escalate their privileges.

ad21725ec8f1e90c19f60987850e7e7416d45ec0.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in WebKitGTK+. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in WebKitGTK+, allowing remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a Denial of Service condition.. background: WebKitGTK+ is a full-featured port of the WebKit rendering engine.. extra: A remote attack can use multiple vectors to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service condition.

7a88a97132bb0097bab8a139ca75103846286bb3.title: Bugzilla: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201607-11
7a88a97132bb0097bab8a139ca75103846286bb3.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Bugzilla. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in Bugzilla, the worst of which could lead to the escalation of privileges.. background: Bugzilla is the bug-tracking system from the Mozilla project.. extra: Privileged account holders could execute system level commands, and the new user process could be exploited to allow for the escalation of privileges.

224575630f3ba8277047e17aabd02a5e5fdca1a1.title: VLC: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201603-08
224575630f3ba8277047e17aabd02a5e5fdca1a1.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in VLC. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in VLC allowing remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause Denial of Service.. background: VLC is a cross-platform media player and streaming server.. extra: Remote attackers could possibly execute arbitrary code or cause Denial of Service.

16607851101f9408fa89fd7b8428becbafcda454.title: Chromium: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201408-16
16607851101f9408fa89fd7b8428becbafcda454.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Chromium. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in Chromium, the worst of which can allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.. background: Chromium is an open-source web browser project.. extra: A remote attacker could conduct a number of attacks which include: cross site scripting attacks, bypassing of sandbox protection, potential execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the process, or cause a Denial of Service condition.

d889ae8a6a99756cc8929236101c9b9a49778907.title: Pillow: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201612-52
d889ae8a6a99756cc8929236101c9b9a49778907.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Pillow. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in Pillow, the worst of which may allow execution of arbitrary code.. background: The friendly PIL fork.. extra: A local attacker could perform symlink attacks to overwrite arbitrary files with the privileges of the user running the application, or obtain sensitive information.

13b49f7c3927ac2810a0b421bdf40d78b66aef30.title: eGroupWare: Remote code execution — GLSA 201711-12
13b49f7c3927ac2810a0b421bdf40d78b66aef30.body: It was found that eGroupWare contains multiple code injection vulnerabilities in multiple parameters and routes because of improper input sanitization.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in eGroupWare, the worst of which allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.. background: eGroupWare is a suite of web-based group applications including calendar, address book, messenger and email.. extra: A remote attacker could execute arbitrary code, delete arbitrary files or inject arbitrary PHP objects via multiple routes.

c10fe5a659b50a258b6365a9f870e64f4fe1d249.title: file: Denial of service — GLSA 201503-08
c10fe5a659b50a258b6365a9f870e64f4fe1d249.body: Multiple issues with the ELF parser used by the file utility have been detected and fixed.. subTitle: Vulnerabilities in file could allow a context-dependent attack to create a Denial of Service condition.. background: The file utility attempts to identify a file’s format by scanning binary data for patterns.. extra: A context-dependent attacker can cause Denial of Service.

32ffe2335c064bb4e297c9310a12ed482d29c04a.title: Cacti: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201509-03
32ffe2335c064bb4e297c9310a12ed482d29c04a.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in cacti. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in Cacti, the worst of which could lead to arbitrary code execution.. background: Cacti is a complete frontend to rrdtool. extra: A remote attacker could possibly execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the process, or cause a Denial of Service condition.

14e812b7d3ae35225149868053d73491bd082a23.title: GD: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201607-04
14e812b7d3ae35225149868053d73491bd082a23.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in GD. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in GD, the worst of which allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.. background: GD is a graphic library for fast image creation.. extra: A remote attacker could possibly execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the process, or cause a Denial of Service condition.

0fad8ed68d88616cccf99fb5227c3dee584734a1.title: LinuxCIFS utils: Buffer overflow — GLSA 201612-08
0fad8ed68d88616cccf99fb5227c3dee584734a1.body: A stack-based buffer overflow was discovered in cifskey.c or cifscreds.c in LinuxCIFS, as used in “pam_cifscreds.”. subTitle: A vulnerability in LinuxCIFS utils' "cifscreds" PAM module might allow remote attackers to have an unspecified impact via unknown vectors.. background: The LinuxCIFS utils are a collection of tools for managing Linux CIFS Client Filesystems.. extra: A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause an unspecified impact.

31344c333606f1d37f8ee3c433883c6089284fea.title: GKSu: Arbitrary command execution — GLSA 201812-10
31344c333606f1d37f8ee3c433883c6089284fea.body: A vulnerability was discovered in GKSu’s gksu-run-helper.. subTitle: A vulnerability in GKSu might allow attackers to execute arbitrary commands.. background: A library that provides a Gtk+ frontend to su and sudo.. extra: An attacker could execute arbitrary commands.

929e469f3d2ec6ac77c18bf0165b2abade8b9109.title: libmms: Remote execution of arbitrary code — GLSA 201612-29
929e469f3d2ec6ac77c18bf0165b2abade8b9109.body: A heap-based buffer overflow was discovered in the get_answer function within mmsh.c of libmms.. subTitle: A heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability in libmms might allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.. background: libmms is a library for downloading (streaming) media files using the mmst and mmsh protocols.. extra: A remote attacker might send a specially crafted MMS over HTTP (MMSH) response, possibly resulting in the remote execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the process.

f200eebba8917b4c2613d720830a4358591430fd.title: CyaSSL: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201612-53
f200eebba8917b4c2613d720830a4358591430fd.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in CyaSSL. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in CyaSSL, the worst of which may allow attackers to execute arbitrary code.. background: CyaSSL is a small, fast, portable implementation of TLS/SSL for embedded devices to the cloud.. extra: An attacker could possibly execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the process, cause a Denial of Service condition, or conduct a man-in-the-middle attack.

a96ad5ec700af5e9387f49ddc5a3e17f2c42fc10.title: Exim: Arbitrary code execution — GLSA 201607-12
a96ad5ec700af5e9387f49ddc5a3e17f2c42fc10.body: Vulnerabilities have been discovered in Exim’s implementation of set-uid root and when using ‘perl_startup’. These vulnerabilities require a user account on the Exim server and a configuration that does lookups against files to which the user has edit access.. subTitle: A local attacker could execute arbitrary code by providing unsanitized data to a data source or escalate privileges.. background: Exim is a message transfer agent (MTA) designed to be a a highly configurable, drop-in replacement for sendmail.. extra: A local attacker could possibly execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the process, or escalate privileges.

45e6243937b865a68612a8d4ac1e98fdf5e961c8.title: DirectFB: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201701-55
45e6243937b865a68612a8d4ac1e98fdf5e961c8.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in DirectFB. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in DirectFB, all of which could allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.. background: DirectFB (Direct Frame Buffer) is a set of graphics APIs implemented on top of the Linux Frame Buffer (fbdev) abstraction layer.. extra: Remote attackers could cause a Denial of Service condition or execute arbitrary code via the Voodoo interface.

e7165d9baf480392f4ac17bf78c58f54f2610504.title: BIND: Multiple Vulnerabilities — GLSA 201502-03
e7165d9baf480392f4ac17bf78c58f54f2610504.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in BIND. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in BIND, allowing remote attackers to cause a denial of service condition.. background: BIND (Berkeley Internet Name Domain) is a Name Server.. extra: A remote attacker can cause a denial of service condition by the lack of GeoIP databases, or via a large or infinite number of referrals.

4439aa6d9c224463f75bfcc839f48284f9582131.title: encfs: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201512-09
4439aa6d9c224463f75bfcc839f48284f9582131.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in encfs. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in encfs, the worst of which can allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a Denial of Service condition.. background: Encfs is an implementation of encrypted filesystem in user-space using FUSE.. extra: A local attacker can utilize a possible buffer overflow in the encodeName method of StreamNameIO and BlockNameIO to execute arbitrary code or cause a Denial of Service. Also multiple weak cryptographics practices have been found in encfs.

a0476ac0270dd56b6271fd292989bd3eae8ec904.title: QEMU: Multiple Vulnerabilities — GLSA 201412-01
a0476ac0270dd56b6271fd292989bd3eae8ec904.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in QEMU. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in QEMU, the worst of which allows context dependent attackers to cause Denial of Service.. background: QEMU is a generic and open source machine emulator and virtualizer.. extra: A context-dependent attacker could cause a Denial of Service condition and a local user can obtain sensitive information.

b3cb21415d66174658d5f163f225b9bb485ead4f.title: SNMP: Denial of service — GLSA 201507-17
b3cb21415d66174658d5f163f225b9bb485ead4f.body: A specially crafted trap message triggers a conversion to an erroneous variable type when the -OQ option is used.. subTitle: A vulnerability in SNMP could lead to a Denial of Service condition.. background: SNMP is a widely used protocol for monitoring the health and welfare of network equipment.. extra: A remote attacker could possibly cause a Denial of Service condition.

f23f3750ba09498f52fc878977a4e69866563652.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in claws-mail. cc3a794ffadc14c789f7ad1017f2af6224a75795.body: LibreOffice is a powerful office suite; its clean interface and powerful tools let you unleash your creativity and grow your productivity.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in both LibreOffice and OpenOffice allowing remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause Denial of Service.. background: Apache OpenOffice is the leading open-source office software suite for word processing, spreadsheets, presentations, graphics, databases and more.. extra: Multiple vulnerabilities were found in both LibreOffice and OpenOffice that allow the remote execution of arbitrary code and potential Denial of Service. These vulnerabilities may be exploited through multiple vectors including crafted documents, link handling, printer setup in ODF document types, DOC file formats, and Calc spreadsheets. Please review the referenced CVE’s for specific information regarding each.

afa77eb45fee19c2c1dd06714622e5f6e07528b9.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Apache. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in WebKitGTK+, the worst of which may allow execution of arbitrary code.. background: WebKitGTK+ is a full-featured port of the WebKit rendering engine, suitable for projects requiring any kind of web integration, from hybrid HTML/CSS applications to full-fledged web browsers. WebKitGTK+ is made by a lively community of developers and designers, who hope to bring the web platform to everyone. It’s the official web engine of the GNOME platform and is used in browsers such as Epiphany and Midori.. extra: A remote attacker can use multiple vectors to execute arbitrary code or cause a Denial of Service condition.

552966a489582c76793443ab0821e94f63c495fe.body: An absolute path traversal vulnerability has been found in GNU Wget.. subTitle: An absolute path traversal vulnerability could lead to arbitrary code execution.. background: GNU Wget is a free software package for retrieving files using HTTP, HTTPS and FTP, the most widely-used Internet protocols.. extra: A remote FTP server is able to write to arbitrary files, and consequently execute arbitrary code.

This may be leveraged by an attacker to gain control of program execution with the privileges of the user.

3521eb21979428e1cb7b657432ee3ae209f15b7a.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in the GNU C Library. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in the GNU C Library, the worst of which allows context-dependent attackers to execute arbitrary code.. background: The GNU C library is the standard C library used by Gentoo Linux systems.. extra: A context-dependent attacker could possibly execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the process, disclose sensitive information, or cause a Denial of Service condition via multiple vectors.

790d7c9d76e107f9a2f7594f3b86349e3d928d90.title: imlib2: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201611-12

Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in imlib2, the worst of which allows for the remote execution of arbitrary code.. background: imlib2 is an advanced replacement for image manipulation libraries such as libXpm. It is utilized by numerous programs, including gkrellm and several window managers, to display images.. extra: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted image file using an application linked against imlib2, possibly resulting in execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the process or a Denial of Service condition.

51dfe8ef9a855b19c487d85e60c7ef1dc0142d53.title: xdelta: User-assisted execution of arbitrary code — GLSA 201701-40
51dfe8ef9a855b19c487d85e60c7ef1dc0142d53.body: A buffer overflow can be triggered within xdelta when ran against a malicious input file.. subTitle: A buffer overflow in xdelta might allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.. background: Xdelta is a C library and command-line tool for delta compression using VCDIFF/RFC 3284 streams.. extra: A remote attacker could coerce the victim to run xdelta against a malicious input file. This may be leveraged by an attacker to crash xdelta and gain control of program execution.

a08cd1841b29538e1253bea6bebbccd328be878e.title: Binary diff: Heap-based buffer overflow — GLSA 202003-44
a08cd1841b29538e1253bea6bebbccd328be878e.body: It was discovered that the implementation of bspatch did not check for a negative value on numbers of bytes read from the diff and extra streams.. subTitle: A heap-based buffer overflow in Binary diff might allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.. background: bsdiff and bspatch are tools for building and applying patches to binary files.. extra: A remote attacker could entice a user to apply a specially crafted patch using bspatch, possibly resulting in execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the process or a Denial of Service condition.

001ff75406c3f05cafc46c7f34e34462b1569f2d.body: A heap-based buffer overflow was discovered in openfs.c in the libext2fs library in e2fsprogs.. subTitle: A heap-based buffer overflow in e2fsprogs might allow local attackers to execute arbitrary code.. background: e2fsprogs is a set of utilities for maintaining the ext2, ext3 and ext4 file systems.. extra: A remote attacker could entice a user to use ext2fs library (for example, fsck) on a specially crafted Ext2/3/4 file system possibly resulting in the execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the process or a Denial of Service condition.

195fa237fa9e0723f0f13e87d734b69fa1e5015f.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in OpenSSL. Please review the upstream advisory and CVE identifiers referenced below for details. Note that the list includes CVE identifiers for an older OpenSSL Security Advisory (3 Dec 2015) for which we have not issued a GLSA before.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in OpenSSL, allowing remote attackers to disclose sensitive information and complete weak handshakes.. background: OpenSSL is an Open Source toolkit implementing the Secure Sockets Layer (SSL v2/v3) and Transport Layer Security (TLS v1) as well as a general purpose cryptography library.. extra: A remote attacker could disclose a server’s private DH exponent, or complete SSLv2 handshakes using ciphers that have been disabled on the server.

0f88b8dc1cdffbcadf9d683ed9e82528b58be78a.title: FUSE: incorrect filtering of environment variables leading to privilege escalation — GLSA 201603-04
0f88b8dc1cdffbcadf9d683ed9e82528b58be78a.body: The fusermount binary calls setuid(geteuid()) to reset the RUID when it invokes /bin/mount so that it can use privileged mount options that are normally restricted if RUID != EUID. FUSE does not properly clear environment variables before invoking mount or umount as root allowing this to be passed to operations using elevated privileges such as LIBMOUNT_MTAB that is used by the mount commands debugging feature.. subTitle: The fusermount binary in FUSE does not properly clear the environment before invoking mount or umount as root that allows a local user to overwrite arbitrary files.. background: FUSE provides an interface for filesystems implemented in userspace.. extra: The FUSE vulnerability allows a local, unprivileged user to overwrite arbitrary files on the system.

f098f34e4553dcce184177015b0f621d36f901db.title: NTFS-3G: Privilege escalation — GLSA 201701-19
f098f34e4553dcce184177015b0f621d36f901db.body: NTFS-3G is affected by the same vulnerability as reported in “GLSA 201603-04” when the bundled fuse-lite implementation is used.. subTitle: A vulnerability in NTFS-3G allows local users to gain root privileges.. background: NTFS-3G is a stable, full-featured, read-write NTFS driver for various operating systems.. extra: A local user could gain root privileges.

463258fffb7b53ecbe7dfcfa546b170f14b0312a.title: Libreswan: Multiple Vulnerabilities — GLSA 201603-13
463258fffb7b53ecbe7dfcfa546b170f14b0312a.body: The pluto IKE daemon in Libreswan, when built with NSS, allows remote attackers to cause a Denial of Service (assertion failure and daemon restart) via a zero DH g^x value in a KE payload in a IKE packet. Additionally, remote attackers could cause a Denial of Service (daemon restart) via an IKEv1 packet with (1) unassigned bits set in the IPSEC DOI value or (2) the next payload value set to ISAKMP_NEXT_SAK.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in libreSwan possibly resulting in Denial of Service.. background: Libreswan is a free software implementation of the most widely supported and standarized VPN protocol based on (“IPsec”) and the Internet Key Exchange (“IKE”).. extra: Remote attackers could possibly cause Denial of Service.

3dd5c260964d84c865c9d1e5d1fdaabe9190c183.title: QEMU: Arbitrary code execution — GLSA 201510-02
3dd5c260964d84c865c9d1e5d1fdaabe9190c183.body: Heap-based buffer overflow has been found in QEMU’s PCNET controller.. subTitle: A heap-based buffer overflow in QEMU could result in execution of arbitrary code.. background: QEMU is a generic and open source machine emulator and virtualizer.. extra: A remote attacker could execute arbitrary code via a specially crafted packets.

827e171d313a05a3715c401c0ac46a3535fe7819.body: Normally, only privileged users can coerce libvirt into creating or opening existing files using the virStorageVol APIs; and such users already have full privilege to create any domain XML.. subTitle: Libvirt is vulnerable to directory traversal when using Access Control Lists (ACL).. background: libvirt is a C toolkit for manipulating virtual machines.. extra: But in the case of fine-grained ACLs, it is feasible that a user can be granted storage_vol:create but not domain:write, and it violates assumptions if such a user can abuse libvirt to access files outside of the storage pool.

e77b6f02fc7adc87b0bb04829533a2c9170cdf8a.title: Git: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201605-01
e77b6f02fc7adc87b0bb04829533a2c9170cdf8a.body: Git is vulnerable to the remote execution of arbitrary code by cloning repositories with large filenames or a large number of nested trees. Additionally, some protocols within Git, such as git-remote-ext, can execute arbitrary code found within URLs. These URLs that submodules use may come from arbitrary sources (e.g., .gitmodules files in a remote repository), and can effect those who enable recursive fetch. Restrict the allowed protocols to well known and safe ones.. subTitle: Git contains multiple vulnerabilities that allow for the remote execution of arbitrary code.. background: Git is a free and open source distributed version control system designed to handle everything from small to very large projects with speed and efficiency.. extra: Remote attackers could execute arbitrary code on both client and server.

ee0fe8e8e530220779e7c312ffe1378f12276d8d.body: Remote authenticated users with certain permissions can read arbitrary files or possibly execute arbitrary code via .. in the _skin parameter to index.php. Additionally, a cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in program/js/app.js allows remote authenticated users to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the file name in a drag-n-drop file upload.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in Roundcube allowing remote authenticated users to execute arbitrary code, inject arbitrary web scripts, and perform cross-site scripting (XSS).. background: Free and open source webmail software for the masses, written in PHP.. extra: A remote authenticated user could possibly execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the process, inject arbitrary web scripts or HTML, read arbitrary files, or perform XSS.

ed0dd2a6643c943a6af3f23826fdc2287a4bea87.title: GRUB: Authentication bypass — GLSA 201512-03
ed0dd2a6643c943a6af3f23826fdc2287a4bea87.body: An integer underflow in GRUB’s username/password authentication code has been discovered.. subTitle: GRUB's authentication prompt can be bypassed by entering a sequence of backspace characters.. background: GNU GRUB is a multiboot boot loader used by most Linux systems.. extra: An attacker with access to the system console may bypass the username prompt by entering a sequence of backspace characters, allowing them e.g. to get full access to GRUB’s console or to load a customized kernel.

d510eb4897aacfdd45ee95b7bff22e0750ceb418.title: Pygments: Arbitrary code execution — GLSA 201612-05
d510eb4897aacfdd45ee95b7bff22e0750ceb418.body: A vulnerability in FontManager’s _get_nix_font_path function allows shell metacharacters to be passed in a font name.. subTitle: Pygments is vulnerable to remote code execution if an attacker is allowed to specify the font name.. background: Pygments is a generic syntax highlighter suitable for use in code hosting, forums, wikis or other applications that need to prettify source code.. extra: A remote attacker could possibly execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the process.

Additionally, a remote attacker could cause a Denial of Service condition.

6d3f5fd4bb8b49d470c4c555a976ed67c1dbf01a.title: OCaml: Buffer overflow and information disclosure — GLSA 201702-15
6d3f5fd4bb8b49d470c4c555a976ed67c1dbf01a.body: It was discovered that OCaml was vulnerable to a runtime bug that, on 64-bit platforms, causes size arguments to internal memmove calls to be sign-extended from 32- to 64-bits before being passed to the memmove function. This leads to arguments between 2GiB and 4GiB being interpreted as larger than they are (specifically, a bit below 2^64), causing a buffer overflow. Further, arguments between 4GiB and 6GiB are interpreted as 4GiB smaller than they should be causing a possible information leak.. subTitle: A buffer overflow in OCaml might allow remote attackers to obtain sensitive information or crash an OCaml-based application.. background: OCaml is a high-level, strongly-typed, functional, and object-oriented programming language from the ML family of languages.. extra: A remote attacker, able to interact with an OCaml-based application, could possibly obtain sensitive information or cause a Denial of Service condition.

Furthermore, a remote attacker may be able to obtain sensitive information.

2de50659383a9d15140132a4c0d3cfe7a19ecec5.title: Bash: Arbitrary code execution — GLSA 201612-39

Injecting malicious code into $HOSTNAME could cause it to run each time Bash expands \h in the prompt string.. subTitle: A vulnerability in Bash could potentially lead to arbitrary code execution.. background: Bash is the standard GNU Bourne Again SHell.. extra: A remote attacker controlling the system’s hostname (i.e. via DHCP) could possibly execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the process, or cause a Denial of Service condition.

68bdd604adc6cc6581e3df01fd5ce38e42049f9d.title: OpenSSL: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201603-15
68bdd604adc6cc6581e3df01fd5ce38e42049f9d.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in OpenSSL, the worst being a cross-protocol attack called DROWN that could lead to the decryption of TLS sessions. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in OpenSSL, the worst allowing remote attackers to decrypt TLS sessions.. background: OpenSSL is an Open Source toolkit implementing the Secure Sockets Layer (SSL v2/v3) and Transport Layer Security (TLS v1) as well as a general purpose cryptography library.. extra: A remote attacker could decrypt TLS sessions by using a server supporting SSLv2 and EXPORT cipher suites as a Bleichenbacher RSA padding oracle, cause a Denial of Service condition, obtain sensitive information from memory and (in rare circumstances) recover RSA keys.

69d3f7fe850c0c48195af12660fa81a2771d9cad.title: Xerces-C++: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201612-46

Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in Xerces-C++, the worst of which may allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.. background: Xerces-C++ is a validating XML parser written in a portable subset of C++.. extra: A remote attacker could entice a user to process a specially crafted file, possibly resulting in the remote execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the process, or a Denial of Service condition.

2bed6418042d97e152c1900d19719fa0163d2952.title: libssh and libssh2: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201606-12
2bed6418042d97e152c1900d19719fa0163d2952.body: libssh and libssh2 both have a bits/bytes confusion bug and generate an abnormaly short ephemeral secret for the diffie-hellman-group1 and diffie-hellman-group14 key exchange methods. The resulting secret is 128 bits long, instead of the recommended sizes of 1024 and 2048 bits respectively.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in libssh and libssh2, the worst of which allows remote attackers to cause Denial of Service.. background: libssh is a mulitplatform C library implementing the SSHv2 and SSHv1 protocol on client and server side.. extra: Additionally, a double free on dangling pointers in initial key exchange packets within libssh could leave dangling pointers in the session crypto structures. It is possible to send a malicious kexinit package to eventually cause a server to do a double-free before this fix. This could be used for a Denial of Service attack.

4fa6f88b88ee8c1bd293582b40a41d5d9ce63c72.title: nginx: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201606-06
4fa6f88b88ee8c1bd293582b40a41d5d9ce63c72.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in nginx. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in nginx, the worst of which may allow a remote attacker to cause a Denial of Service.. background: nginx is a robust, small, and high performance HTTP and reverse proxy server.. extra: A remote attacker could possibly cause a Denial of Service condition via a crafted packet.

92139732a396e8989eaa5f45b3512453b295efdd.title: cURL: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201701-47
92139732a396e8989eaa5f45b3512453b295efdd.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in cURL. 7d93142a753e24b7085036dec28664a11290ad61.title: OpenSSH: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201601-01
7d93142a753e24b7085036dec28664a11290ad61.body: Qualys have reported two issues in the “roaming” code included in the OpenSSH client, which provides undocumented, experimental support for resuming SSH connections. An OpenSSH client could be tricked into leaking parts of its memory to a malicious server. Furthermore, a buffer overflow can be exploited by a malicious server, but its exploitation requires non-default options and is mitigated due to another bug.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in OpenSSH, allowing attackers to leak client memory to a server, including private keys.. background: OpenSSH is a complete SSH protocol implementation that includes SFTP client and server support.. extra: A remote attacker could entice a user to connect to a specially crafted OpenSSH server, possibly resulting in the disclosure of the user’s private keys. Users with private keys that are not protected by a passphrase are advised to generate new keys if they have connected to an SSH server they don’t fully trust.

605d982c70c079742e27b4c75703e4d2128ea100.title: Xen: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201612-56

Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in Xen, the worst of which could lead to the execution of arbitrary code on the host system.. background: Xen is a bare-metal hypervisor.. extra: A local attacker could possibly execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the process, could gain privileges on the host system, cause a Denial of Service condition, or obtain sensitive information.

f82a824bfb7eaeb77881d23cb95172b2783107d7.title: QEMU: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201701-49

624e0d32dce84e0d904227f2a3699ca3b2be9420.title: libpng: Remote execution of arbitrary code — GLSA 201701-74
624e0d32dce84e0d904227f2a3699ca3b2be9420.body: A null pointer dereference was discovered in libpng in the png_push_save_buffer function. In order to be vulnerable, an application has to load a text chunk into the PNG structure, then delete all text, then add another text chunk to the same PNG structure, which seems to be an unlikely sequence, but it is possible.. subTitle: A null pointer dereference in libpng might allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.. background: libpng is a standard library used to process PNG (Portable Network Graphics) images. It is used by several programs, including web browsers and potentially server processes.. extra: A remote attacker, by enticing a user to process a specially crafted PNG file, could execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the process.

b10bbf15fffec320df21b0337286f0993d1076ab.title: PCSC-Lite: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201702-01
b10bbf15fffec320df21b0337286f0993d1076ab.body: The SCardReleaseContext function normally releases resources associated with the given handle (including “cardsList”) and clients should cease using this handle. However, a malicious client can make the daemon invoke SCardReleaseContext and continue issuing other commands that use “cardsList”, resulting in a use-after-free. When SCardReleaseContext is invoked multiple times it additionally results in a double-free of “cardsList”.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in PCSC-Lite, the worst of which could lead to privilege escalation.. background: PCSC-Lite is a middleware to access a smart card using the SCard API (PC/SC).. extra: A local attacker could use a malicious client to connect to pcscd’s Unix socket, possibly resulting in a Denial of Service condition or privilege escalation since the daemon is running as root.

0502f1efbb448d6b9137f208e8c2dbfa19cca599.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in PHP. c928df337d72b8bfa5fc7a44a78ae37170d81fda.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in virglrenderer. db8e76ba217f6b7f4724860e3ef828158ed6279d.title: libXpm: Remote execution of arbitrary code — GLSA 201701-72
db8e76ba217f6b7f4724860e3ef828158ed6279d.body: An integer overflow was discovered in libXpm’s src/CrDatFrI.c file. On 64 bit systems, this allows an overflow to occur on 32 bit integers while parsing XPM extensions in a file.. subTitle: An integer overflow in libXpm might allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a Denial of Service Condition.. background: The X PixMap image format is an extension of the monochrome X BitMap format specified in the X protocol, and is commonly used in traditional X applications.. extra: A remote attacker, by enticing a user to process a specially crafted XPM file, could execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the process or cause a Denial of Service condition.

2d72ad2db74ae276ea1d36ccde315a2151bf4723.title: Ruby Archive::Tar::Minitar: Directory traversal — GLSA 201702-32
2d72ad2db74ae276ea1d36ccde315a2151bf4723.body: Michal Marek discovered that Ruby Archive::Tar::Minitar is vulnerable to a directory traversal vulnerability.. subTitle: Ruby Archive::Tar::Minitar is vulnerable to a directory traversal attack.. background: Archive::Tar::Minitar is a pure-Ruby library and command-line utility that provides the ability to deal with POSIX tar(1) archive files.. extra: A remote attacker could entice a user or an automated system to process a specially crafted archive using Ruby Archive::Tar::Minitar possibly allowing the writing of arbitrary files with the privileges of the process.

87b89a1c0c1eda3c18f0f861dfa88975abcf542a.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in glibc. a0f3e05b5ef283539597849ad43ce0869b252779.title: Kpathsea: User-assisted execution of arbitrary code — GLSA 201709-07
a0f3e05b5ef283539597849ad43ce0869b252779.body: It was discovered that the mpost program from the shell_escape_commands list is capable of executing arbitrary external programs during the conversion of .tex files. The responsible function is runpopen() (texmfmp.c).. subTitle: A vulnerability in Kpathsea allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary commands by manipulating the -tex option from mpost program.. background: Kpathsea is a library to do path searching. It is used by TeX Live and others TeX related software.. extra: A remote attacker, by enticing a user to open a specially crafted .tex file, could possibly execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the process.

5de36107b6f01d3062a9113e450b36cf67e53113.body: Gajim unconditionally implements the “XEP-0146: Remote Controlling Clients” extension.. subTitle: A vulnerability in Gajim might allow remote attackers to intercept encrypted communications.. background: Gajim is a Jabber/XMPP client which uses GTK+.. extra: Remote attackers, by enticing a user to connect to a malicious XMPP server, could extract plaintext from Off The Record (OTR) encrypted sessions.

9bf0a5f225ef3f6a06ca570e8fa858260e04e479.body: A heap overflow can be triggered via malformed DHCP responses in the print_option (via dhcp_envoption1) due to incorrect option length values. These vulnerabilities could also allow remote attackers to trigger an invalid read/crash via malformed DHCP responses.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in dhcpcd allowing remote attackers to possibly execute arbitrary code or cause a Denial of Service.. background: A fully featured, yet light weight RFC2131 compliant DHCP client. extra: Remote attackers could possibly execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the process or cause Denial of Service.

An if statement, which is responsible for checking the necessity to reallocate memory in the target buffer, is off by one therefore an out of bounds write occurs.. subTitle: A buffer overflow in libbsd might allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.. background: This library provides useful functions commonly found on BSD systems, and lacking on others like GNU systems, thus making it easier to port projects with strong BSD origins, without needing to embed the same code over and over again on each project.. extra: Remote attackers could potentially execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the process.

Additionally, a time based side-channel attack may allow a local attacker to recover a private DSA key.

d7664ed115b274c51370b406c658de5f405bb152.title: libksba: Denial of Service and information disclosure — GLSA 201706-22
d7664ed115b274c51370b406c658de5f405bb152.body: It was found that an unproportionate amount of memory is allocated when parsing crafted certificates in libskba, which may lead to Denial of Service condition.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in libksba which might allow remote attackers to obtain sensitive information or crash an libksba-based application.. background: Libksba is a X.509 and CMS (PKCS#7) library.. extra: Moreover in libksba 1.3.4, allocated memory is uninitialized and could potentially contain sensitive data left in freed memory block.

Please review the referenced CVE identifiers for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in Zend Framework, the worst of which could allow attackers to remotely execute arbitrary commands.. background: Zend Framework is a high quality and open source framework for developing Web Applications.. extra: Remote attackers could execute arbitrary commands or conduct SQL injection attacks.

7ada65ac8b766c0dad676c42184e77c052876da0.title: VLC: Buffer overflow — GLSA 201701-39
7ada65ac8b766c0dad676c42184e77c052876da0.body: A buffer overflow was discovered in the DecodeAdpcmImaQT function in modules/codec/adpcm.c in the VideoLAN VLC media player.. subTitle: A buffer overflow in VLC might allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.. background: VLC is a cross-platform media player and streaming server.. extra: Remote attackers, by enticing a user to execute a specially crafted QuickTime IMA file, could cause a Denial of Service condition or possibly execute arbitrary code.

Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in the Chromium web browser, the worst of which allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.. background: Chromium is an open-source browser project that aims to build a safer, faster, and more stable way for all users to experience the web.. extra: A remote attacker could possibly execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the process, cause a Denial of Service condition, obtain sensitive information, or bypass security restrictions.

b5b66f0ae70daecfb3bb3aec8c31922663b892d0.title: c-ares: Heap-based buffer overflow — GLSA 201701-28
b5b66f0ae70daecfb3bb3aec8c31922663b892d0.body: A hostname with an escaped trailing dot (such as “hello\.”) would have its size calculated incorrectly leading to a single byte written beyond the end of a buffer on the heap.. subTitle: A heap-based buffer overflow in c-ares might allow remote attackers to cause a Denial of Service condition.. background: c-ares is a C library for asynchronous DNS requests (including name resolves).. extra: A remote attacker, able to provide a specially crafted hostname to an application using c-ares, could potentially cause a Denial of Service condition.

3d2932f849f6c8ae838aedeee3150ae8485f889d.title: Firewalld: Improper authentication methods — GLSA 201701-70
3d2932f849f6c8ae838aedeee3150ae8485f889d.body: A flaw in Firewalld allows any locally logged in user to tamper with or change firewall settings. This is due to how Firewalld handles authentication via polkit which is not properly applied to 5 particular functions to include: addPassthrough, removePassthrough, addEntry, removeEntry, and setEntries.. subTitle: A vulnerability in Firewalld allows firewall configurations to be modified by unauthenticated users.. background: Firewalld provides a dynamically managed firewall with support for network/firewall zones to define the trust level of network connections or interfaces.. extra: A local attacker could tamper or change firewall settings leading to the additional exposure of systems to include unauthorized remote access.

1e251b3f17239ae33adf69e6618f389dadb32b97.title: IcedTea: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201701-43
1e251b3f17239ae33adf69e6618f389dadb32b97.body: Various OpenJDK attack vectors in IcedTea, such as 2D, Corba, Hotspot, Libraries, and JAXP, exist which allows remote attackers to affect the confidentiality, integrity, and availability of vulnerable systems. Many of the vulnerabilities can only be exploited through sandboxed Java Web Start applications and java applets. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in IcedTea allowing remote attackers to affect confidentiality, integrity, and availability through various vectors.. background: IcedTea’s aim is to provide OpenJDK in a form suitable for easy configuration, compilation and distribution with the primary goal of allowing inclusion in GNU/Linux distributions.. extra: Remote attackers may execute arbitrary code, compromise information, or cause a Denial of Service condition.

6996988512c0135e88619077f19b0104d12fd495.title: Oracle JRE/JDK: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201611-04
6996988512c0135e88619077f19b0104d12fd495.body: Multiple vulnerabilities exist in both Oracle’s JRE and JDK. Please review the referenced CVE’s for additional information.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in Oracle's JRE and JDK software suites allowing remote attackers to remotely execute arbitrary code, obtain information, and cause Denial of Service.. background: Java Platform, Standard Edition (Java SE) lets you develop and deploy Java applications on desktops and servers, as well as in today’s demanding embedded environments. Java offers the rich user interface, performance, versatility, portability, and security that today’s applications require.. extra: Remote attackers could gain access to information, remotely execute arbitrary code, or cause Denial of Service.

Mozilla Firefox is a popular open-source web browser from the Mozilla Project.. extra: Please review the referenced Mozilla Foundation Security Advisories and CVE identifiers below for details.

860335a5c24444537438072d122b1f6c39d765ba.title: PECL HTTP: Remote execution of arbitrary code — GLSA 201612-17
860335a5c24444537438072d122b1f6c39d765ba.body: A buffer overflow can be triggered in the URL parsing functions of the PECL HTTP extension. This allows overflowing a buffer with data originating from an arbitrary HTTP request.. subTitle: A buffer overflow in PECL HTTP might allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.. background: This HTTP extension aims to provide a convenient and powerful set of functionality for one of PHPs major applications.. extra: A remote attacker, through a specially crafted URI, could possibly execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the process.

f5d8612229bc40cd304a4d9739d708288f7751e0.title: Shadow: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201706-02

Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in MuPDF, the worst of which allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.. background: A lightweight PDF, XPS, and E-book viewer.. extra: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted PDF document using MuPDF possibly resulting in the execution of arbitrary code, with the privileges of the process, or a Denial of Service condition.

8098c0ec0ec69d02f74731a928d520cce6b86c40.title: ICU: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201701-58
8098c0ec0ec69d02f74731a928d520cce6b86c40.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in ICU. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in ICU, the worst of which could cause a Denial of Service condition.. background: ICU is a mature, widely used set of C/C++ and Java libraries providing Unicode and Globalization support for software applications.. extra: Remote attackers could cause a Denial of Service condition or possibly have other unspecified impacts via a long locale string or httpAcceptLanguage argument. Additionally, A remote attacker, via a specially crafted file, could cause an application using ICU to parse untrusted font files resulting in a Denial of Service condition. Finally, remote attackers could affect confidentiality via unknown vectors related to 2D.

c1a07a6aca494691c1a9b8ccf0cf37737c1e5bed.title: BusyBox: Denial of service — GLSA 201701-05
c1a07a6aca494691c1a9b8ccf0cf37737c1e5bed.body: The recv_and_process_client_pkt function in networking/ntpd.c in BusyBox allows remote attackers to cause a Denial of Service (CPU and bandwidth consumption) via a forged NTP packet, which triggers a communication loop.. subTitle: A vulnerability in BusyBox might allow remote attackers to cause a Denial of Service condition.. background: BusyBox is a set of tools for embedded systems and is a replacement for GNU Coreutils.. extra: A remote attacker might send a specially crafted package to a machine running BusyBox ntpd, possibly resulting in a Denial of Service condition.

f5a8b2ffee27878bbe9834a76dc9b8c4cebec6ac.title: GnuPG: RNG output is predictable — GLSA 201612-01
f5a8b2ffee27878bbe9834a76dc9b8c4cebec6ac.body: A long standing bug (since 1998) in Libgcrypt (see “GLSA 201610-04” below) and GnuPG allows an attacker to predict the output from the standard RNG. Please review the “Entropy Loss and Output Predictability in the Libgcrypt PRNG” paper below for a deep technical analysis.. subTitle: Due to a design flaw, the output of GnuPG's Random Number Generator (RNG) is predictable.. background: The GNU Privacy Guard, GnuPG, is a free replacement for the PGP suite of cryptographic software.. extra: An attacker who obtains 580 bytes of the random number from the standard RNG can trivially predict the next 20 bytes of output.

d4b9cff7ea441782c5753d8c6a6aaed5ee01d635.title: CrackLib: Buffer overflow — GLSA 201612-25
d4b9cff7ea441782c5753d8c6a6aaed5ee01d635.body: A stack-based buffer overflow was discovered in the FascistGecosUser function of lib/fascist.c.. subTitle: A vulnerability in CrackLib could lead to the execution of arbitrary code.. background: CrackLib is a library used to enforce strong passwords by comparing user selected passwords to words in chosen word lists.. extra: A local attacker could set a specially crafted GECOS field value in “/etc/passwd”; possibly resulting in the execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the process, a Denial of Service condition, or the escalation of privileges.

5ac185da7aa2453bd0994c61711e4f7d9f1569d0.title: Tar: Extract pathname bypass — GLSA 201611-19
5ac185da7aa2453bd0994c61711e4f7d9f1569d0.body: Tar attempts to avoid path traversal attacks by removing offending parts of the element name at extract. This sanitizing leads to a vulnerability where the attacker can bypass the path name(s) specified on the command line.. subTitle: A path traversal attack in Tar may lead to the remote execution of arbitrary code.. background: The Tar program provides the ability to create and manipulate tar archives.. extra: The attacker can create a crafted tar archive that, if extracted by the victim, replaces files and directories the victim has access to in the target directory, regardless of the path name(s) specified on the command line.

575c45dee4082b3b736d816dd6d7c5c94fd1bf3b.title: flex: Potential insecure code generation — GLSA 201701-31
575c45dee4082b3b736d816dd6d7c5c94fd1bf3b.body: A heap-based buffer overflow in the yy_get_next_buffer function in Flex might allow context-dependent attackers to cause a denial of service or possibly execute arbitrary code via vectors involving num_to_read.. subTitle: Flex might generate code with a buffer overflow making applications using such scanners vulnerable to the execution of arbitrary code.. background: flex is a programming tool used to generate scanners (programs which recognize lexical patterns in text).. extra: Context-dependent attackers could cause a Denial of Service condition or possibly execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the process.

fc02cd9865149896a011a3385282e178ee092ab0.title: Xen: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201611-09
fc02cd9865149896a011a3385282e178ee092ab0.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Xen. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in Xen, the worst of which allows gaining of privileges on the host system.. background: Xen is a bare-metal hypervisor.. extra: A malicious guest administrator could escalate their privileges on the host system or cause a Denial of Service. Additionally, a malicious unprivileged guest user may be able to obtain or corrupt sensitive information (including cryptographic material) in other programs in the same guest.

36a8f135585a8f3d5fb35ff32dd4bc85e34c543c.title: AutoTrace: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201708-09
36a8f135585a8f3d5fb35ff32dd4bc85e34c543c.body: Heap-based buffer overflows have been discovered in the pstoedit_suffix_table_init and pnm_load_rawpbm functions of AutoTrace.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in AutoTrace, the worst of which could cause a Denial of Service condition.. background: AutoTrace converts bitmap to vector graphics.. extra: Remote attackers, by enticing a user to process a crafted bmp image file, could cause a Denial of Service condition.

5cc9805eae162b53279719a81a8211c2bc5a8685.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Dropbear. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in Dropbear, the worst of which allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.. background: Dropbear is an SSH server and client designed with a small memory footprint.. extra: A remote attacker could possibly execute arbitrary code with root privileges if usernames containing special characters can be created on a system. Also, a dbclient user who can control username or host arguments could potentially run arbitrary code with the privileges of the process.

0b7d419b85a62e91a8842cf8238e791d257560fe.body: Icinga daemon was found to perform unsafe operations when handling the log file.. subTitle: A vulnerability in Icinga could lead to privilege escalation.. background: Icinga is an open source computer system and network monitoring application. It was originally created as a fork of the Nagios system monitoring application in 2009.. extra: A local attacker, who either is already Icinga’s system user or belongs to Icinga’s group, could potentially escalate privileges.

Additionally, a local attacker could cause a Denial of Service condition against arbitrary processes due to the improper dropping of privileges.

bda0d7183c79f62d0098e017a79e295c337c90c9.title: Ansible: Remote execution of arbitrary code — GLSA 201701-77
bda0d7183c79f62d0098e017a79e295c337c90c9.body: An input validation vulnerability was found in Ansible’s handling of data sent from client systems.. subTitle: A vulnerability in Ansible may allow rogue clients to execute commands on the Ansible controller.. background: Ansible is a radically simple IT automation platform.. extra: An attacker with control over a client system being managed by Ansible and the ability to send facts back to the Ansible server could execute arbitrary code on the Ansible server using the Ansible-server privileges.

d59a4a3de6238ca04f85dcae558f627a2503dd7f.title: NTFS-3G: Privilege escalation — GLSA 201702-10
d59a4a3de6238ca04f85dcae558f627a2503dd7f.body: The NTFS-3G driver does not properly clear environment variables before invoking mount or umount.. subTitle: A vulnerability in NTFS-3G allows local users to gain root privileges.. background: NTFS-3G is a stable, full-featured, read-write NTFS driver for various operating systems.. extra: This flaw is similar to the vulnerability described in “GLSA-201701-19” and “GLSA-201603-04” referenced below but is now implemented in the NTFS-3G driver itself.

88831518e75a136087d7955667a9776eca8c122f.title: Opus: User-assisted execution of arbitrary code — GLSA 201702-21
88831518e75a136087d7955667a9776eca8c122f.body: A large NLSF values could cause the stabilization code in silk/NLSF_stabilize.c to wrap-around and have the last value in NLSF_Q15[] to be negative, close to -32768.. subTitle: A vulnerability in Opus could cause memory corruption.. background: Opus is a totally open, royalty-free, highly versatile audio codec.. extra: Under normal circumstances, the code will simply read from the wrong table resulting in an unstable LPC filter. The filter would then go through the LPC stabilization code at the end of silk_NLSF2A().

Please review the referenced CVE identifiers and bug entries for details.. subTitle: Gentoo's collectd package contains multiple vulnerabilities, the worst of which may allow local attackers to escalate privileges.. background: collectd is a daemon which collects system and application performance metrics periodically and provides mechanisms to store the values in a variety of ways, for example in RRD files.. extra: A local attacker, who either is already collectd’s system user or belongs to collectd’s group, could potentially gain root privileges and cause a Denial of Service condition.

579555ff367668b387877f2fd293a05a0a32255b.title: WebKitGTK+: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201709-03
579555ff367668b387877f2fd293a05a0a32255b.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in WebkitGTK+. Please review the references below for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in WebkitGTK+, the worst of which may allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.. background: WebKitGTK+ is a full-featured port of the WebKit rendering engine, suitable for projects requiring any kind of web integration, offers Webkit’s full functionality and is used on a wide range of systems.. extra: A remote attacker could execute arbitrary code via crafted web content.

68b6001624e70612866f0098ea69c4883be8d12f.title: QEMU: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201702-28
68b6001624e70612866f0098ea69c4883be8d12f.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in QEMU. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in QEMU, the worst of which could lead to the execution of arbitrary code on the host system.. background: QEMU is a generic and open source machine emulator and virtualizer.. extra: A local attacker could potentially execute arbitrary code with privileges of QEMU process on the host, gain privileges on the host system, cause a Denial of Service condition, or obtain sensitive information.

6806e4e505fa8176cd5461e66ecf8c56b66ee523.title: Xen: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201702-27
6806e4e505fa8176cd5461e66ecf8c56b66ee523.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Xen. Please review the CVE identifiers and Xen Security Advisory referenced below for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in Xen, the worst of which could lead to the execution of arbitrary code on the host system.. background: Xen is a bare-metal hypervisor.. extra: A local attacker could potentially execute arbitrary code with privileges of Xen (QEMU) process on the host, gain privileges on the host system, cause a Denial of Service condition, or obtain sensitive information.

c2fbcdb28a5a914d1a7bf639732247fff6524089.title: QEMU: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201704-01
c2fbcdb28a5a914d1a7bf639732247fff6524089.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in QEMU. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in QEMU, the worst of which could the worst of which could lead to arbitrary code execution, or cause a Denial of Service condition.. background: QEMU is a generic and open source machine emulator and virtualizer.. extra: Remote server can cause a crash in the client causing execution of arbitrary code, and a Denial of Service within the QEMU process. Remote or Local users within a guest QEMU environment can cause a Denial of Service condition of the QEMU guest process.

57792d84e1a06a3f2a70677e6d1781d79a9a6e08.title: Xen: Privilege Escalation — GLSA 201703-07
57792d84e1a06a3f2a70677e6d1781d79a9a6e08.body: In CIRRUS_BLTMODE_MEMSYSSRC mode the bitblit copy routine cirrus_bitblt_cputovideo fails to check wethehr the specified memory region is safe.. subTitle: A vulnerability in Xen's bundled QEMU version might allow privilege escalation.. background: Xen is a bare-metal hypervisor.. extra: A local attacker could potentially execute arbitrary code with privileges of Xen (QEMU) process on the host, gain privileges on the host system, or cause a Denial of Service condition.

97d2fb49eedfe99a30053179215eb897d7354b43.title: Pidgin: Arbitrary code execution — GLSA 201706-10
97d2fb49eedfe99a30053179215eb897d7354b43.body: Joseph Bisch discovered that Pidgin incorrectly handled certain xml messages.. subTitle: A vulnerability in Pidgin might allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.. background: Pidgin is a GTK Instant Messenger client for a variety of instant messaging protocols.. extra: A remote attacker could send a specially crafted instant message, possibly resulting in execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the Pidgin process.

Additionally attackers may cause a Denial of Service condition, bypass authentication, or cause information loss.

MariaDB is an enhanced, drop-in replacement for MySQL.. extra: An attacker could possibly escalate privileges, gain access to critical data or complete access to all MySQL server accessible data, or cause a Denial of Service condition via unspecified vectors.

Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in VirtualBox, the worst of which might allow unauthorized changes to some critical or all accessible data.. background: VirtualBox is a powerful virtualization product from Oracle.. extra: An attacker could cause a Denial of Service condition. Additionally, an attacker could create, delete or modify critical or all accessible data.

3ba54d4c04787abdfc1c5bbb80cb616eba77e604.title: OpenSSL: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201702-07
3ba54d4c04787abdfc1c5bbb80cb616eba77e604.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in OpenSSL. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in OpenSSL, the worst of which might allow attackers to access sensitive information.. background: OpenSSL is an Open Source toolkit implementing the Secure Sockets Layer (SSL v2/v3) and Transport Layer Security (TLS v1) as well as a general purpose cryptography library.. extra: A remote attacker is able to crash applications linked against OpenSSL or could obtain sensitive private-key information via an attack against the Diffie-Hellman (DH) ciphersuite.

9f0cbc1ba1fcfdfa0b05b469f5cf5120639a69f0.title: OpenSSL: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201712-03

Please review the referenced CVE identifiers for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in OpenSSL, the worst of which may lead to a Denial of Service condition.. background: OpenSSL is a robust, commercial-grade, and full-featured toolkit for the Transport Layer Security (TLS) and Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) protocols.. extra: A remote attacker could cause a Denial of Service condition, recover a private key in unlikely circumstances, circumvent security restrictions to perform unauthorized actions, or gain access to sensitive information.

Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.. subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Firejail, the worst of which may allow privilege escalation.. background: A SUID program that reduces the risk of security breaches by restricting the running environment of untrusted applications using Linux namespaces and seccomp-bpf.. extra: An attacker could possibly bypass sandbox protection, cause a Denial of Service condition, or escalate privileges.
